manzils.text: Kbapha! Sam'manita kora'anera sapatha
baram tara tadera madhya theke'i ekajana bhaya pradarsanakari agamana kareche dekhe bismaya bodha kare. Atahpara kapherara baleh eta ascaryera byapara.
Amara mare gele ebam mrttikaya parinata haye gele'o ki punarut'thita haba? E pratyabartana suduraparahata.
Mrttika tadera katatuku grasa karabe, ta amara jana ache ebam amara kache ache sanraksita kitaba.
Baram tadera kache satya agamana karara para tara take mithya balache. Phale tara sansaye patita rayeche.
Tara ki tadera uparasthita akasera pane drstipata kare na ami kibhabe ta nirmana karechi ebam susobhita karechi? Tate kona chidra'o ne'i.
Ami bhumike bistrta karechi, tate parbatamalara bhara sthapana karechi ebam tate sarbaprakara nayanabhirama udbhida udagata karechi.
Eta jnana aharana o smarana karara mata byapara pratyeka anuragi bandara jan'ye.
Ami akasa theke kalyanamaya brsti barsana kari ebam tadbara bagana o sasya udagata kari, yegulora phasala aharana kara haya.
Ebam lambamana kharjura brksa, yate ache guccha guccha kharjura
bandadera jibikasbarupa ebam brsti dbara ami mrta janapadake sanjibita kari. Emanibhabe punarut'thana ghatabe.
Tadera purbe mithyabadi baleche nuhera sampradaya, kupabasira ebam samuda sampradaya.
Ada, phera'una, o lutera sampradaya
banabasira ebam tobba sampradaya. Pratyeke'i rasulaganake mithya baleche, atahpara amara sastira yogya hayeche.
Ami ki prathamabara srsti kare'i klanta haye parechi? Baram tara natuna srstira byapare sandeha posana kareche.
Ami manusa srsti karechi ebam tara mana nibhrte ye kucinta kare, se sambandhe'o ami abagata achi. Ami tara gribasthita dhamani theke'o adhika nikatabarti.
Yakhana du'i pheresata dane o bame base tara amala grahana kare.
Se ye katha'i uccarana kare, ta'i grahana karara jan'ye tara kache sada prastuta prahari rayeche.
Mrtyuyantrana niscita'i asabe. E theke'i tumi talabahana karate.
Ebam singaya phumtkara deya habe eta habe bhaya pradarsanera dina.
Pratyeka byakti agamana karabe. Tara sathe thakabe calaka o karmera saksi.
Tumi to e'i dina samparke udasina chile. Ekhana tomara kacha theke yabanika sariye diyechi. Phale aja tomara drsti sutiksna.
Tara sangi pheresata balabeh amara kache ye, amalanama chila, ta e'i.
Tomara ubhaye'i niksepa kara jahanname pratyeka akrtajna birud'dhabadike
ye badha dita mangalajanaka kaje, simalanghanakari, sandeha posanakarike.
Ye byakti allahara sathe an'ya upasya grahana karata, take tomara kathina sastite niksepa kara.
Tara sangi sayatana balabeh he amadera palanakarta, ami take abadhyataya lipta karini. Bastutah se nije'i chila sudura pathabhrantite lipta.
Allaha balabenah amara samane bakabitanda karo na ami to purbe'i tomaderake ayaba dbara bhaya pradarsana karechilama.
Amara kache katha radabadala haya na ebam ami bandadera prati julumakari na'i.
Yedina ami jahannamake jijnasa karaba; tumi ki purna haye gecha? Se balabeh ara'o ache ki
jannatake upasthita kara habe khodabhirudera adure.
Tomadera pratyeka anuragi o smaranakarike era'i pratisruti deya hayechila.
Ye na dekhe dayamaya allaha ta’alake bhaya karata ebam binita antare upasthita hata.
Tomara ete santite prabesa kara. Eta'i anantakala basabasera jan'ya prabesa karara dina.
Tara tathaya ya ca'ibe, ta'i pabe ebam amara kache rayeche ara'o adhika.
Ami tadera purbe bahu sampradayake dhbansa karechi, tara edera apeksa adhika saktisali chila ebam dese-bidese bicarana kare phirata. Tadera kona palayana sthana chila na.
Ete upadesa rayeche tara jan'ye, yara anudhabana karara mata antara rayeche. Athaba se nibista mane srabana kare.
Ami nabhomandala, bhumandala o etadubhayera madhyabarti sabakichu chayadine srsti karechi ebam amake konarupa klanti sparsa kareni.
Ata'eba, tara ya kichu bale, tajjan'ye apani chabara karuna ebam, suryodaya o suryastera purbe apanara palanakartara saprasansa pabitrata ghosana karuna.
Ratrira kichu anse tamra pabitrata ghosana karuna ebam namayera pascate'o.
Suna, ye dina eka ahabanakari nikatabarti sthana theke ahabana karabe.
Yedina manusa niscita se'i bhayabaha a'oyaja sunate pabe, sedina'i punarat'thana dibasa.
Ami jibana dana kari, mrtyu ghata'i ebam amara'i dike sakalera pratyabartana.
Yedina bhumandala bidirna haye manusa chutachuti kare bera haye asabe. Eta emana samabeta kara, ya amara jan'ye ati sahaja.
Tara ya bale, ta ami samyaka abagata achi. Apani tadera upara jorajabarakari nana. Ata'eba, ye amara sastike bhaya kare, take kora'anera madhyame upadesa dana karuna.
Kasama jhanjhabayura.
Atahpara bojha bahanakari meghera.
Atahpara mrdu calamana jalayanera
atahpara karma bantanakari pheresataganera
tomadera pradatta oyada abasya'i satya.
Inasapha abasyambhabi.
Pathabisista akasera kasama
tomara to birodhapurna katha balacha.
Ye bhrasta, se'i e theke mukha phiraya
anumanakarira dhbansa hoka
yara udasina, bhranta.
Tara jijnasa kare, keyamata kabe habe
yedina tara agnite patita habe
tomara tomadera sasti asbadana kara. Tomara eke'i tbaranbita karate ceyechila.
Khodabhirura jannate o prasrabane thakabe.
Ematabasthaya ye, tara grahana karabe ya tadera palanakarta taderake debena. Niscaya itipurbe tara chila satkarmaparayana
tara ratrira saman'ya anse'i nidra yeta
ratera sesa prahare tara ksamaprarthana karata
ebam tadera dhana-sampade prarthi o bancitera haka chila.
Bisbasakaridera jan'ye prthibite nidarsanabali rayeche
ebam tomadera nijedera madhye'o, tomara ki anudhabana karabe na
akase rayeche tomadera riyika o pratisruta sabakichu.
Nabhomandala o bhumandalera palanakartara kasama, tomadera kathabartara mata'i eta satya.
Apanara kache ibrahimera sam'manita mehamanadera brttanta eseche ki
Yakhana tara tamra kache upasthita haye balalah salama, takhana se balalah salama. Era to aparicita loka.
Atahpara se grahe gela ebam ekati ghrtepakka mota gobatsa niye hayira hala.
Se gobatsati tadera samane rekhe balalah tomara ahara karacha na kena
atahpara tadera samparke se mane mane bhita halah tara balalah bhita habena na. Tara tamke ekata jnaniguni putra santanera susambada dila.
Atahpara tamra stri citkara karate karate samane ela ebam mukha capariye balalah ami to brd'dha, bandhya.
Tara balalah tomara palanakarta erupa'i balechena. Niscaya tini prajnamaya, sarbajna.
Ibrahima balalah he prerita pheresatagana, tomadera uddesya ki
tara balalah amara eka aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi
yate tadera upara matira dhila niksepa kari.
Ya simatikramakaridera jan'ye apanara palanakartara kache cihiߦ#2468; ache.
Atahpara sekhane yara imanadara chila, ami taderake ud'dhara karalama.
Ebam sekhane ekati grha byatita kona musalamana ami pa'ini.
Yara yantranadayaka sastike bhaya kare, ami tadera jan'ye sekhane ekati nidarsana rekhechi.
Ebam nidarsana rayeche musara brttante; yakhana ami take suspasta pramanasaha phera'unera kache prerana karechilama.
Atahpara se saktibale mukha phiriye nila ebam balalah se haya yadukara, na haya pagala.
Atahpara ami take o tara senabahinike pakara'o karalama ebam taderake samudre niksepa karalama. Se chila abhiyukta.
Ebam nidarsana rayeche tadera kahinite; yakhana ami tadera upara prerana karechilama asubha bayu.
E'i bayu yara upara diye prabahita hayechilah take'i curna-bicurna kare diyechila.
Ara'o nidarsana rayeche samudera ghatanaya; yakhana taderake bala hayechila, kichukala maja lute na'o.
Atahpara tara tadera palanakartara adesa aman'ya karala ebam tadera prati bajraghata hala ematabasthaya ye, tara ta dekhechila.
Atahpara tara damrate saksama hala na ebam kona pratikara'o karate parala na.
Ami itipurbe nuhera sampradayake dhbansa karechi. Niscita'i tara chila papacari sampradaya.
Ami sbiya ksamatabale akasa nirmana karechi ebam ami abasya'i byapaka ksamatasali.
Ami bhumike bichiyechi. Ami kata sundarabhabe'i na bichate saksama.
Ami pratyeka bastu joraya joraya srsti karechi, yate tomara hrdayangama kara.
Ata'eba, allahara dike dhabita ha'o. Ami tamra tarapha theke tomadera jan'ye suspasta satarkakari.
Tomara allahara sathe kona upasya sabyasta karo na. Ami tamra paksa theke tomadera jan'ya suspasta satarkakari.
Emanibhabe, tadera purbabartidera kache yakhana'i kona rasula agamana kareche, tara balacheh yadukara, na haya um'mada.
Tara ki eke aparake e'i upadesa'i diye geche? Bastutah ora dusta sampradaya.
Ata'eba, apani odera theke mukha phiriye nina. Ete apani aparadhi habena na.
Ebam bojhate thakuna; kenana, bojhano muminadera upakare asabe.
Amara ebadata karara jan'ya'i ami manaba o jina jati srsti karechi.
Ami tadera kache jibika ca'i na ebam eta'o ca'i na ye, tara amake aharya yogabe.
Allaha ta’ala'i to jibikadata saktira adhara, parakranta.
Ata'eba, e'i yalemadera prapya ta'i, ya odera atita sahacaradera prapya chila. Kaje'i ora yena amara kache ta taratari na caya.
Ata'eba, kapheradera jan'ye durbhoga se'i dinera, yedinera pratisruti oderake deya hayeche.
Kasama turaparbatera
ebam likhita kitabera
prasasta patre
kasama bayatula-mamura tatha abada grhera
ebam samunnata chadera
ebam uttala samudrera
apanara palanakartara sasti abasyambhabi
ta ke'u pratirodha karate parabe na.
Sedina akasa prakampita habe prabalabhabe.
Ebam parbatamala habe calamana
sedina mithyaropakaridera durbhoga habe
Yara kriracchale michemichi katha banaya.
Sedina tomaderake jahannamera agnira dike dhakka mere mere niye ya'oya habe.
Ebam bala habeh e'i se'i agni, yake tomara mithya balate
eta ki jadu, na tomara cokhe dekhacha na
ete prabesa kara atahpara tomara sabara kara athaba na kara, ubhaya'i tomadera jan'ya samana. Tomara ya karate tomaderake kebala tara'i pratiphala deya habe.
Niscaya khodabhirura thakabe jannate o neyamate.
Tara upabhoga karabe ya tadera palanakarta tadera debena ebam tini jahannamera ayaba theke taderake raksa karabena.
Taderake bala habeh tomara ya karate tara pratiphalasbarupa tomara trpta haye panahara kara.
Tara srenibad'dha sinhasane helana diye basabe. Ami taderake ayatalocana huradera sathe bibahabandhane abad'dha kare deba.

Yara imanadara ebam yadera santanara imane tadera anugami, ami taderake tadera pitrpurusadera sathe milita kare deba ebam tadera amala bindumatra'o hrasa karaba na. Pratyeka byakti nija krta karmera jan'ya dayi.
Ami taderake deba phala-mula ebam mansa ya tara ca'ibe.
Sekhane tara eke aparake panapatra debe; yate asara bakabaki ne'i ebam papakarma'o ne'i.
Suraksita motisadrsa kisorara tadera sebaya ghuraphera karabe.
Tara eke aparera dike mukha kare jijnasabada karabe.
Tara balabeh amara itipurbe nijedera basagrhe bhita-kampita chilama.
Atahpara allaha amadera prati anugraha karechena ebam amaderake agunera sasti theke raksa karechena.
Amara purbe'o allahake dakatama. Tini saujan'yasila, parama dayalu.
Ata'eba, apani upadesa dana karuna. Apanara palanakartara krpaya apani atindriyabadi nana ebam um'mada'o nana.
Tara ki balate cayah se ekajana kabi amara tara mrtyu-durghatanara pratiksa karachi.
Balunah tomara pratiksa kara, ami'o tomadera sathe pratiksarata achi.
Tadera bud'dhi ki e bisaye taderake adesa kare, na tara simalanghanakari sampradaya
na tara baleh e'i kora'ana se nije racana kareche? Baram tara abisbasi.
Yadi tara satyabadi haye thake, tabe'era anurupa kona racana upasthita karuka.
Tara ki apana-apani'i srjita haye geche, na tara nijera'i srasta
na tara nabhomandala o bhumandala srsti kareche? Baram tara bisbasa kare na.
Tadera kache ki apanara palanakartara bhandara rayeche, na tara'i sabakichura tattbabadhayaka
na tadera kona simri ache, yate arohana kare tara srabana kare? Thakale tadera srota suspasta pramana upasthita karuka.
Na tara kan'ya-santana ache ara tomadera ache putrasantana
na apani tadera kache parisramika cana ye, tadera upara jarimanara bojha cepe base
na tadera kache adrsya bisayera jnana ache ye, tara'i ta lipibad'dha kare
na tara cakranta karate caya? Ata'eba yara kaphera, tara'i cakrantera sikara habe.
Na tadera allaha ta’ala byatita kona upasya ache? Tara yake sarika kare, allaha ta’ala ta theke pabitra.
Tara yadi akasera kona khandake patita hate dekhe, tabe bale eta to punjibhuta megha.
Taderake chere dina sedina paryanta, yedina tadera upara bajraghata patita habe.
Sedina tadera cakranta tadera kona upakare asabe na ebam tara sahayyaprapta'o habe na.
Gonahagaradera jan'ye echara ara'o sasti rayeche, kintu tadera adhikansa'i ta jane na.

Apani apanara palanakartara nirdesera apeksaya sabara karuna. Apani amara drstira samane achena ebam apani apanara palanakartaꦣ2494;ra saprasansa pabitrata ghosana karuna yakhana apani gatrot'thana karena.
Ebam ratrira kichu anse ebam taraka astamita ha'oyara samaya tamra pabitrata ghosana karuna.
Naksatrera kasama, yakhana astamita haya.
Tomadera sangi pathabhrasta hanani ebam bipathagami'o hanani.
Ebam prabrttira taranaya katha balena na.
Kora'ana ohi, ya pratyadesa haya.
Tamke siksa dana kare eka saktisali pheresata
sahajata saktisampanna, se nija akrtite prakasa pela.
Urdhba digante
atahpara nikatabarti hala o jhule gela.
Takhana du'i dhanukera byabadhana chila athaba ara'o kama.
Takhana allaha tamra dasera prati ya pratyadesa karabara, ta pratyadesa karalena.
Rasulera antara mithya baleni ya se dekheche.
Tomara ki bisaye bitarka karabe ya se dekheche
niscaya se take arekabara dekhechila
sidaratulamuntahara nikate
yara kache abasthita basabasera jannata.
Yakhana brksati dbara acchanna ha'oyara, taddbara acchanna chila.
Tamra drstibibhrama haya ni ebam simalanghana'o kareni.
Niscaya se tara palanakartara mahana nidarsanabali abalokana kareche.
Tomara ki bhebe dekhecha lata o oyaya samparke.
Ebam trtiya arekati manata samparke
putra-santana ki tomadera jan'ye ebam kan'ya-santana allahara jan'ya
ematabasthaya eta to habe khuba'i asangata bantana.

Egulo katagulo nama bai naya, ya tomara ebam tomadera purba-purusadera rekhecha. Era samarthane allaha kona dalila nayila karenani. Tara anumana ebam prabrttira'i anusarana kare. Athaca tadera kache tadera palanakartara paksa theke patha nirdesa eseche.
Manusa ya caya, ta'i ki paya
ata'eba, parabarti o purbabarti saba mangala'i allahara hate.
Akase aneka pheresata rayeche. Tadera kona suparisa phalaprasu haya na yataksana allaha yara jan'ye iccha o yake pachanda karena, anumati na dena.
Yara parakale bisbasa kare na, tara'i pheresatake naribacaka nama diye thake.
Athaca e bisaye tadera kona jnana ne'i. Tara kebala anumanera upara cale. Athaca satyera byapare anumana mote'i phalaprasu naya.
Ata'eba ye amara smarane bimukha ebam kebala parthiba jibana'i kamana kare tara tarapha theke apani mukha phiriye nina.
Tadera jnanera paridhi e paryanta'i. Niscaya apanara palanakarta bhala janena, ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche ebam tini'i bhala janena ke supathaprapta hayeche.
Nabhomandala o bhumandale ya kichu ache, saba'i allahara, yate tini mandakarmiderake tadera karmera pratiphala dena ebam satkarmiderake dena bhala phala.

Yara bara bara gonaha o aslilakarya theke bemce thake chotakhata aparadha karale'o niscaya apanara palanakartara ksama sudura bistrta. Tini tomadera samparke bhala janena, yakhana tini tomaderake srsti karechena mrttika theke ebam yakhana tomara matrgarbhe kaci sisu chile. Ata'eba tomara atnaprasansa karo na. Tini bhala janena ke sanyami.
Apani ki take dekhechena, ye mukha phiriye neya.
Ebam deya saman'ya'i o pasana haye yaya.

take ki janano hayani ya ache musara kitabe
ebam ibrahimera kitabe, ye tara dayitba palana karechila
kitabe e'i ache ye, kona byakti kara'o gonaha nije bahana karabe na.
Ebam manusa ta'i paya, ya se kare
tara karma sighra'i dekha habe.

tara takhana abanamita netre kabara theke bera habe biksipta pangapala sadrsa.
Tara ahabanakarira dike daurate thakabe. Kaphera balabeh eta kathina dina.
Tadera purbe nuhera sampradaya'o mithyaropa karechila. Tara mithyaropa karechila amara banda nuhera prati ebam balechilah e to um'mada. Tamra take humaki pradarsana karechila.
Atahpara se tara palanakartake deke balalah ami aksama, ata'eba, tumi pratibidhana kara.
Takhana ami khule dilama akasera dbara prabala baribarsanera madhyame.

kemana kathora chila amara sasti o satarkabani.

Ada sampradaya mithyaropa karechila, atahpara kemana kathora hayechila amara sasti o satarkabani.

Ta manusake utkhata karachila, yena tara utpatita kharjura brksera kanda.

samuda sampradaya satarkakaridera prati mithyaropa karechila.
Tara balechilah amara ki amadera'i ekajanera anusarana karaba? Tabe to amara bipathagami o bikara grastharupe ganya haba.
Amadera madhye ki tara'i prati upadesa nayila kara hayeche? Baram se ekajana mithyabadi, dambhika.
Ekhana agamikalya'i tara janate parabe ke mithyabadi, dambhika.
Ami tadera pariksara jan'ya eka ustri prerana karaba, ata'eba, tadera prati laksya rakha ebam sabara kara.
Ebam taderake janiye da'o ye, tadera madhye panira pala nirdharita hayeche ebam palakrame upasthita hate habe.
Atahpara tara tadera sangike dakala. Se take dharala ebam badha karala.
Atahpara kemana kathora chila amara sasti o satarkabani.
Ami tadera prati ekatimatra ninada prerana karechilama. Ete'i tara haye gela suska sakhapallaba nirmita dalita khoyarera n'yaya.

Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe

ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
bhuprstera sabakichu'i dhbansasila.
Ekamatra apanara mahimaya o mahanubhaba palanakartara satta chara.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
nabhomandala o bhumandalera saba'i tamra kache prarthi. Tini sarbada'i kona na kona kaje rata achena.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
he jina o manaba! Ami sighra'i tomadera jan'ye karmamukta haye yaba.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
he jina o manabakula, nabhomandala o bhumandalera pranta atikrama kara yadi tomadera sadhye kulaya, tabe atikrama kara. Kintu charapatra byatita tomara ta atikrama karate parabe na.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
chara habe tomadera prati agnisphulinga o dhumrakunja takhana tomara sesaba pratihata karate parabe na.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
yedina akasa bidirna habe takhana seti raktabarne ranjita camarara mata haye yabe.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
sedina manusa na tara aparadha samparke jijnasita habe, na jina.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
aparadhidera paricaya pa'oya yabe tadera cehara theke; atahpara tadera kapalera cula o pa dhare tene neya habe.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
eta'i jahannama, yake aparadhira mithya balata.
Tara jahannamera agni o phutanta panira majhakhane pradaksina karabe.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
ye byakti tara palanakartara samane pesa ha'oyara bhaya rakhe, tara jan'ye rayeche du’ti udyana.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe
ubhaya udyana'i ghana sakha-pallababisista.

Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe

prabala o padmaraga sadrsa ramanigana.
Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe

Ata'eba, tomara ubhaye tomadera palanakartara kona kona abadanake asbikara karabe

Yakhana kiyamatera ghatana ghatabe
yara bastabataya kona sansaya ne'i.
Eta nicu kare debe, samunnata kare debe.
Yakhana prabalabhabe prakampita habe prthibi.

Ebam tomara tinabhabe bibhakta haye parabe.
Yara dana dike, kata bhagyabana tara.

Agrabartigana to agrabarti'i.

ya pana karale tadera sirahpira habe na ebam bikaragrasta o habe na.
Ara tadera pachandamata phala-mula niye

Tara thakabe kamtabihina badarika brkse.

Ami srsti karechi tomaderake. Atahpara kena tomara ta satya bale bisbasa kara na.

Tomara take srsti kara, na ami srsti kari
ami tomadera mrtyukala nirdharita karechi ebam ami aksama na'i.
E byapare ye, tomadera paribarte tomadera mata lokake niye asi ebam tomaderake emana kare de'i, ya tomara jana na.
Tomara abagata hayecha prathama srsti samparke, tabe tomara anudhabana kara na kena

baram amara huta sarbasba haye paralama.

Ebam tomara takiye thaka
