Ata'eba, apani apanara mahana palanakartara name pabitrata ghosana karuna.
Nabhomandala o bhumandale ya kichu ache, saba'i allahara pabitrata ghosana kare. Tini saktidhara; prajnamaya.
Nabhomandala o bhumandalera rajatba tamra'i. Tini jibana dana karena o mrtyu ghatana. Tini sabakichu karate saksama.
Tini'i prathama, tini'i sarbasesa, tini'i prakasamana o aprakasamana ebam tini saba bisaye samyaka parijnata.

Tini nabhomandala o bhu-mandala srsti karechena chayadine, atahpara arasera upara samasina hayechena. Tini janena ya bhumite prabesa kare o ya bhumi theke nirgata haya ebam ya akasa theke barsita haya o ya akase ut'thita haya. Tini tomadera sathe achena tomara yekhane'i thaka. Tomara ya kara, allaha ta dekhena.
Nabhomandala o bhumandalera rajatba tamra'i. Sabakichu tamra'i dike pratyabartana karabe.
Tini ratrike dibase prabista karena ebam dibasake prabista karena ratrite. Tini antarera bisayadi samparke'o samyaka jnata.

Tomara allaha o tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana kara ebam tini tomaderake yara uttaradhikari karechena, ta theke byaya kara. Ata'eba, tomadera madhye yara bisbasa sthapana kare o byaya kare, tadera jan'ye rayeche mahapuraskara.

Tomadera ki hala ye, tomara allahara prati bisbasa sthapana karacha na, athaca rasula tomaderake tomadera palanakartara prati bisbasa sthapana karara da'oyata dicchena? Allaha to purbe'i tomadera angikara niyechena-yadi tomara bisbasi ha'o.
Tini'i tamra dasera prati prakasya ayata abatirna karena, yate tomaderake andhakara theke aloke anayana karena. Niscaya allaha tomadera prati karunamaya, parama dayalu.

Tomaderake allahara pathe byaya karate kise badha deya, yakhana allaha'i nabhomandala o bhumandalera uttaradhikari? Tomadera madhye ye makka bijayera purbe byaya kareche o jehada kareche, se samana naya. Erupa lokadera maryada bara tadera apeksa, yara pare byaya kareche o jehada kareche. Tabe allaha ubhayake kalyanera oyada diyechena. Tomara ya kara, allaha se samparke samyaka jnata.
Ke se'i byakti, ye allahake uttama dhara dibe, erapara tini tara jan'ye ta bahugune brd'dhi karabena ebam tara jan'ye rayeche sam'manita puraskara.

Yedina apani dekhabena imanadara purusa o imanadara nariderake, tadera sam'mukha bhage o danaparsbe tadera jyoti chutochuti karabe bala habeh aja tomadera jan'ye susambada jannatera, yara taladese nadi prabahita, tate tara cirakala thakabe. Eta'i mahasaphalya.

Yedina kapata bisbasi purusa o kapata bisbasini narira muminaderake balabeh tomara amadera jan'ye apeksa kara, amara'o kichu alo niba tomadera jyoti theke. Bala habeh tomara pichane phire ya'o o alora khomja kara. Atahpara ubhaya dalera majhakhane khara kara habe ekati pracira, yara ekati daraja habe. Tara abhyantare thakabe rahamata ebam ba'ire thakabe ayaba.

Tara muminaderake deke balabeh amara ki tomadera sathe chilama na? Tara balabeh hamya kintu tomara nijera'i nijederake bipadagrasta karecha. Pratiksa karecha, sandeha posana karecha ebam alika asara pechane bibhranta hayecha, abasese allahara adesa paumcheche. E'i saba'i tomaderake allaha samparke pratarita kareche.

Ata'eba, aja tomadera kacha theke kona muktipana grahana kara habe na. Ebam kapheradera kacha theke'o naya. Tomadera sabara abasthala jahannama. Seta'i tomadera sangi. Kata'i na nikrsta e'i pratyabartana sthala.

Yara mumina, tadera jan'ye ki allahara smarane ebam ye satya abartirna hayeche, tara karane hrdaya bigalita ha'oyara samaya aseni? Tara tadera mata yena na haya, yaderake purbe kitaba deya hayechila. Tadera upara sudirghakala atikranta hayeche, atahpara tadera antahkarana kathina haye geche. Tadera adhikansa'i papacari.
Tomara jene rakha, allaha'i bhu-bhagake tara mrtyura para punarujjibita karena. Ami pariskarabhabe tomadera jan'ye ayatagulo byakta karechi, yate tomara bojha.
Niscaya danasila byakti o danasila nari, yara allahake uttamarupe dhara deya, taderake deya habe bahuguna ebam tadera jan'ye rayeche sam'manajanaka puraskara.

Ara yara allaha o tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana kare tara'i tadera palanakartara kache siddika o sahida bale bibecita. Tadera jan'ye rayeche puraskara o jyoti ebam yara kaphera o amara nidarsana asbikarakari tara'i jahannamera adhibasi habe.

Tomara jene rakha, parthiba jibana krira-kautuka, saja-sajja, parasparika ahamika ebam dhana o janera pracurya byatita ara kichu naya, yemana eka brstira abastha, yara sabuja phasala krsakaderake camatkrta kare, erapara ta sukiye yaya, phale tumi take pitabarna dekhate pa'o, erapara ta kharakuta haye yaya. Ara parakale ache kathina sasti ebam allahara ksama o santusti. Parthiba jibana prataranara upakarana bai kichu naya.

Tomara agre dhabita ha'o tomadera palanakartara ksama o se'i jannatera dike, ya akasa o prthibira mata prasasta. Eta prastuta kara hayeche allaha o tamra rasulaganera prati bisbasasthapanakaridera jan'ye. Eta allahara krpa, tini yake iccha, eta dana karena. Allaha mahana krpara adhikari.
Prthibite ebam byaktigatabhabe tomadera upara kona bipada ase na; kintu ta jagata srstira purbe'i kitabe lipibad'dha ache. Niscaya eta allahara pakse sahaja.
Eta ejan'ye bala haya, yate tomara ya hara'o tajjan'ye duhkhita na ha'o ebam tini tomaderake ya diyechena, tajjan'ye ullasita na ha'o. Allaha kona ud'dhata ahankarike pachanda karena na
yara krpanata kare ebam manusake krpanatara prati utsaha deya, ye mukha phiriye neya, tara jana ucita ye, allaha abhabamukta, prasansita.

Ami amara rasulaganake suspasta nidarsanasaha prerana karechi ebam tamdera sathe abatirna karechi kitaba o n'yayaniti, yate manusa inasapha pratistha kare. Ara ami nayila karechi lauha, yate ache pracanda ranasakti ebam manusera bahubidha upakara. Eta ejan'ye ye, allaha jene nibena ke na dekhe tamke o tamra rasulaganake sahayya kare. Allaha saktidhara, parakramasali.

Ami nuha o ibrahimake rasularupe prerana karechi ebam tadera bansadharera madhye nabu'oyata o kitaba abyahata rekhechi. Atahpara tadera kataka satpathaprapta hayeche ebam adhikansa'i hayeche papacari.

Atahpara ami tadera pascate prerana karechi amara rasulaganake ebam tadera anugami karechi mariyama tanaya isake o take diyechi injila. Ami tara anusaridera antare sthapana karechi namrata o daya. Ara bairagya, se to tara nijera'i udbhabana kareche; ami eta tadera upara pharaja karini; kintu tara allahara santusti labhera jan'ye eta abalambana kareche. Atahpara tara yathayathabhabe ta palana kareni. Tadera madhye yara bisbasi chila, ami taderake tadera prapya puraskara diyechi. Ara tadera adhikansa'i papacari.

Muminagana, tomara allahake bhaya kara ebam tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana kara. Tini nije anugrahera dbiguna ansa tomaderake dibena, tomaderake dibena jyoti, yara sahayye tomara calabe ebam tomaderake ksama karabena. Allaha ksamasila, dayamaya.
Yate kitabadharira jane ye, allahara saman'ya anugrahera upara o tadera kona ksamata ne'i, daya allahara'i hate; tini yake iccha, ta dana karena. Allaha maha anugrahasila.

Ye nari tara sbamira bisaye apanara sathe badanubada karache ebam abhiyoga pesa karache allahara darabare, allaha tara katha sunechena. Allaha apanadera ubhayera kathabarta sunena. Niscaya allaha sabakichu sunena, sabakichu dekhena.

Tomadera madhye yara tadera striganake mata bale phele, tadera strigana tadera mata naya. Tadera mata kebala tara'i, yara taderake janmadana kareche. Tara to asamicina o bhittihina katha'i bale. Niscaya allaha marjanakari, ksamasila.

Yara tadera striganake mata bale phele, atahpara nijedera ukti pratyahara kare, tadera kaphaphara e'i eke aparake sparsa karara purbe ekati dasake mukti dibe. Eta tomadera jan'ye upadesa habe. Allaha khabara rakhena tomara ya kara.

Yara e samarthya ne'i, se eke aparake sparsa karara purbe ekadikrame du'i masa roya rakhabe. Ye ete'o aksama haya se sata jana misakinake ahara karabe. Eta ejan'ye, yate tomara allaha o tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana kara. Egulo allahara nirdharita sasti. Ara kapheradera jan'ye rayeche yantrana dayaka ayaba.

Yara allahara tamra rasulera birud'dhacarana kare, tara apadastha hayeche, yemana apadastha hayeche tadera purbabartira. Ami suspasta ayatasamuha nayila karechi. Ara kapheradera jan'ye rayeche apamanajanaka sasti.

Sedina smaraniya; yedina allaha tadera sakalake punarut'thita karabena, atahpara taderake janiye dibena ya tara karata. Allaha tara hisaba rekhechena, ara tara ta bhule geche. Allahara samane upasthita ache saba bastu'i.

Apani ki bhebe dekhenani ye, nabhomandala o bhumandale ya kichu ache, allaha ta janena. Tina byaktira emana kona paramarsa haya na yate tini caturtha na thakena ebam pamca janera'o haya na, yate tini sastha na thakena tara etadapeksa kama hoka ba besi hoka tara yekhane'i thakuka na kena tini tadera sathe achena, tara ya kare, tini keyamatera dina ta taderake janiye dibena. Niscaya allaha sarbabisaye samyaka jnata.

Apani ki bhebe dekhenani, yaderake kanaghusa karate nisedha kara hayechila atahpara tara nisid'dha kajera'i punarabrtti kare ebam papacara, simalanghana ebam rasulera abadhyatara bisaye'i kanaghusa kare. Tara yakhana apanara kache ase, takhana apanake emana bhasaya salama kare, yaddbara allaha apanake salama karenani. Tara mane mane baleh amara ya bali, tajjan'ye allaha amaderake sasti dena na kena? Jahannama'i tadera jan'ye yathesta. Tara tate prabesa karabe. Kata'i na nikrsta se'i jayaga.

Muminagana, tomara yakhana kanakani kara, takhana papacara, simalanghana o rasulera abadhyatara bisaye kanakani karo na baram anugraha o khodabhitira byapare kanakani karo. Allahake bhaya kara, yamra kache tomara ekatrita habe.
E'i kanaghusa to sayatanera kaja; muminaderake duhkha deyara deyara jan'ye. Tabe allahara anumati byatita se tadera kona ksati karate parabe na. Muminadera ucita allahara upara bharasa kara.

Muminagana, yakhana tomaderake bala hayah majalise sthana prasasta kare da'o, takhana tomara sthana prasasta kare di'o. Allahara jan'ye tomadera jan'ya prasasta kare dibena. Yakhana bala hayah uthe ya'o, takhana uthe yeyo. Tomadera madhye yara imanadara ebam yara jnanaprapta, allaha tadera maryada ucca kare dibena. Allaha khabara rakhena ya kichu tomara kara.

Muminagana, tomara rasulera kache kanakatha balate ca'ile tatpurbe sadaka pradana karabe. Eta tomadera jan'ye sreyah o pabitra ha'oyara bhala upaya. Yadi tate saksama na ha'o, tabe allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu.

Tomara ki kanakatha balara purbe sadaka pradana karate bhita haye gele? Atahpara tomara yakhana sadaka dite parale na ebam allaha tomaderake mapha kare dilena takhana tomara namaya kayema kara, yakata pradana kara ebam allaha o rasulera anugatya kara. Allaha khabara rakhena tomara ya kara.

Apani ki tadera prati laksya karenani, yara allahara gayabe nipatita sampradayera sathe bandhutba kare? Tara musalamanadera dalabhukta naya ebam tadera'o dalabhukta naya. Tara jenesune mithya bisaye sapatha kare.
Allaha tadera jan'ye kathora sasti prastuta rekhechena. Niscaya tara ya kare, khuba'i manda.
Tara tadera sapathake dhala kare rekhechena, atahpara tara allahara patha theke manusake badha pradana kare. Ata'eba, tadera jan'ya rayeche apamanajanaka sasti.
Allahara kabala theke tadera dhana-sampada o santana-santati taderake mote'i bamcate parabena. Tara'i jahannamera adhibasi tathaya tara cirakala thakabe.

Yedina allaha tadera sakalake punarut'thita karabena. Atahpara tara allahara samane sapatha karabe, yemana tomadera samane sapatha kare. Tara mane karabe ye, tara kichu satpathe ache. Sabadhana, tara'i to asala mithyabadi.
Sayatana taderake basibhuta kare niyeche, atahpara allahara smarana bhuliye diyeche. Tara sayatanera dala. Sabadhana, sayatanera dala'i ksatigrasta.
Niscaya yara allaha o tamra rasulera birud'dhacarana kare, tara'i lanchitadera dalabhukta.
Allaha likhe diyechenah ami ebam amara rasulagana abasya'i bijayi haba. Niscaya allaha saktidhara, parakramasali.

Yara allaha o parakale bisbasa kare, taderake apani allaha o tamra rasulera birud'dhacaranakaridera sathe bandhutba karate dekhabena na, yadi'o tara tadera pita, putra, bhrata athaba jnati-gosthi haya. Tadera antare allaha imana likhe diyechena ebam taderake saktisali karechena tamra adrsya sakti dbara. Tini taderake jannate dakhila karabena, yara taladese nadi prabahita. Tara tathaya cirakala thakabe. Allaha tadera prati santusta ebam tara allahara prati santusta. Tara'i allahara dala. Jene rakha, allahara dala'i saphalakama habe.
Nabhomandala o bhumandale ya kichu ache, saba'i allahara pabitrata barnana kare. Tini parakramasali mahajnani.

Tini'i kitabadharidera madhye yara kaphera, taderake prathamabara ekatrita kare tadera bari-ghara theke bahiskara karechena. Tomara dharana'o karate parani ye, tara bera habe ebam tara mane karechila ye, tadera durgagulo taderake allahara kabala theke raksa karabe. Atahpara allahara sasti tadera upara emanadika theke asala, yara kalpana'o tara kareni. Allaha tadera antare trasa sancara kare dilena. Tara tadera bari-ghara nijedera hate ebam musalamanadera hate dhbansa karachila. Ata'eba, he caksusmana byaktigana, tomara siksa grahana kara.
Allaha yadi tadera jan'ye nirbasana abadharita na karatena, tabe taderake duniyate sasti ditena. Ara parakale tadera jan'ye rayeche jahannamera ayaba.
Eta e karane ye, tara allaha o tamra rasulera birud'dhacarana kareche. Ye allahara birud'dhacarana kare, tara jana ucita ye, allaha kathora sastidata.
Tomara ye kichu kichu kharjura brksa kete diyecha ebam kataka na kete chere diyecha, ta to allahara'i adesa ebam yate tini abadhyaderake lanchita karena.

Allaha banu-banuyayarera kacha theke tamra rasulake ye dhana-sampada diyechena, tajjan'ye tomara ghoraya kimba ute care yud'dha karani, kintu allaha yara upara iccha, tamra rasulaganake pradhan'ya dana karena. Allaha sabakichura upara sarbasaktimana.

Allaha janapadabasidera kacha theke tamra rasulake ya diyechena, ta allahara, rasulera, tamra atniya-sbajanera, iyatimadera, abhabagrastadera ebam musaphiradera jan'ye, yate dhanaisbaryya kebala tomadera bittasalidera madhye'i punjibhuta na haya. Rasula tomaderake ya dena, ta grahana kara ebam ya nisedha karena, ta theke birata thaka ebam allahake bhaya kara. Niscaya allaha kathora sastidata.

E'i dhana-sampada desatyagi nihsbadera jan'ye, yara allahara anugraha o santustilabhera anbesane ebam allaha tamra rasulera sahayyarthe nijedera bastubhita o dhana-sampada theke bahiskrta hayeche. Tara'i satyabadi.

Yara muhajiradera agamanera purbe madinaya basabasa karechila ebam bisbasa sthapana karechila, tara muhajiradera bhalabase, muhajiraderake ya deya hayeche, tajjan'ye tara antare irsaposana kare na ebam nijera abhabagrasta hale'o taderake agradhikara dana kare. Yara manera karpanya theke mukta, tara'i saphalakama.

Ara e'i sampada tadera jan'ye, yara tadera pare agamana kareche. Tara baleh he amadera palanakarta, amaderake ebam imane agrahi amadera bhrataganake ksama kara ebam imanadaradera birud'dhe amadera antare kona bidbesa rekho na. He amadera palanakarta, apani dayalu, parama karunamaya.

Apani ki munaphikaderake dekhena ni? Tara tadera kitabadhari kaphera bha'iderake baleh tomara yadi bahiskrta ha'o, tabe amara abasya'i tomadera sathe desa theke bera haye yaba ebam tomadera byapare amara kakhana'o kara'o katha manaba na. Ara yadi tomara akranta ha'o, tabe amara abasya'i tomaderake sahayya karaba. Allaha ta’ala saksya dena ye, ora niscaya'i mithyabadi.

Yadi tara bahiskrta haya, tabe munaphikara tadera sathe desatyaga karabe na ara yadi tara akranta haya, tabe tara taderake sahayya karabe na. Yadi taderake sahayya kare, tabe abasya'i prsthapradarsana kare palayana karabe. Erapara kapherara kona sahayya pabe na.
Niscaya tomara tadera antare allaha ta’ala apeksa adhikatara bhayabaha. Eta e karane ye, tara eka nirbodha sampradaya.

Tara sanghabad'dhabhabe'o tomadera birud'dhe yud'dha karate parabe na. Tara yud'dha karabe kebala suraksita janapade athaba durga pracirera arala theke. Tadera parasparika yud'dha'i pracanda haye thake. Apani taderake aikyabad'dha mane karabena; kintu tadera antara satadhabicchinna. Eta e karane ye, tara eka kandajnanahina sampradaya.
Tara se'i lokadera mata, yara tadera nikata atite nijedera karmera sastibhoga kareche. Tadera jan'ye rayeche yantranadayaka sasti.
Tara sayatanera mata, ye manusake kaphera hate bale. Atahpara yakhana se kaphera haya, takhana sayatana baleh tomara sathe amara kona samparka ne'i. Ami bisbapalanakarta allaha ta’alake bhaya kari.
Atahpara ubhayera parinati habe e'i ye, tara jahanname yabe ebam cirakala tathaya basabasa karabe. Eta'i jalemadera sasti.

Muminagana, tomara allaha ta’alake bhaya kara. Pratyeka byaktira ucita, agami kalera jan'ye se ki prerana kare, ta cinta kara. Allaha ta’alake bhaya karate thaka. Tomara ya kara, allaha ta’ala se samparke khabara rakhena.
Tomara tadera mata hayo na, yara allaha ta’alake bhule geche. Phale allaha ta’ala taderake atna bismrta kare diyechena. Tara'i abadhya.
Jahannamera adhibasi ebam jannatera adhibasi samana hate pare na. Yara jannatera adhibasi, tara'i saphalakama.

Yadi ami e'i kora'ana paharera upara abatirna karatama, tabe tumi dekhate ye, pahara binita haye allaha ta’alara bhaye bidirna haye geche. Ami esaba drstanta manusera jan'ye barnana kari, yate tara cinta-bhabana kare.
Tini'i allaha ta’ala, tini byatita kona upasya ne'i; tini drsya o adrsyake janena tini parama dayalu, asima data.

Tini'i allaha tini byatita kona upasya ne'i. Tini'i ekamatra malika, pabitra, santi o nirapattadata, asrayadata, parakranta, pratapanbita, mahatna?486;Ila. Tara yake ansidara kare allaha ta’ ala ta theke pabitra.
Tini'i allaha ta’ala, srasta, udbhabaka, rupadata, uttama nama samuha tamra'i. Nabhomandale o bhumandale ya kichu ache, saba'i tamra pabitrata ghosana kare. Tini parakranta prajnamaya.

Muminagana, tomara amara o tomadera satruderake bandharupe grahana karo na. Tomara to tadera prati bandhutbera barta patha'o, athaca tara ye satya tomadera kache agamana kareche, ta asbikara karache. Tara rasulake o tomaderake bahiskara kare e'i aparadhe ye, tomara tomadera palanakartara prati bisbasa rakha. Yadi tomara amara santustilabhera jan'ye ebam amara pathe jehada karara jan'ye bera haye thaka, tabe kena tadera prati gopane bandhutbera payagama prerana karacha? Tomara ya gopana kara ebam ya prakasa kara, ta ami khuba jani. Tomadera madhye ye eta kare, se saralapatha theke bicyuta haye yaya.
Tomaderake karatalagata karate parale tara tomadera satru haye yabe ebam manda uddesye tomadera prati bahu o rasana prasarita karabe ebam ca'ibe ye, konarupe tomara o kaphera haye ya'o.
Tomadera sbajana-parijana o santana-santati kiyamatera dina kona upakare asabe na. Tini tomadera madhye phayasala karabena. Tomara ya kara, allaha ta dekhena.

Tomadera jan'ye ibrahima o tamra sangiganera madhye camatkara adarsa rayeche. Tara tadera sampradayake balechilah tomadera sathe ebam tomara allahara paribarte yara ebadata kara, tara sathe amadera kona samparka ne'i. Amara tomadera mani na. Tomara eka allahara prati bisbasa sthapana na karale tomadera madhye o amadera madhye cirasatruta thakabe. Kintu ibrahimera ukti tamra pitara uddese e'i adarsera byatikrama. Tini balechilenah ami abasya'i tomara jan'ya ksamaprarthana karaba. Tomara upakarera jan'ye allahara kache amara ara kichu karara ne'i. He amadera palanakarta! Amara tomara'i upara bharasa karechi, tomara'i dike mukha karechi ebam tomara'i nikata amadera pratyabartana.
He amadera palanakarta! Tumi amaderake kapheradera jan'ya pariksara patra karo na. He amadera palanakarta! Amadera ksama kara. Niscaya tumi parakramasali, prajnamaya.
Tomara yara allaha o parakala pratyasa kara, tomadera jan'ya tadera madhye uttama adarsa rayeche. Ara ye mukha phiriye neya, tara jana ucita ye, allaha bepara'oya, prasansara malika.
Yara tomadera satru allaha tadera madhye o tomadera madhye sambhabatah bandhutba srsti kare debena. Allaha saba'i karate parena ebam allaha ksamasila, karunamaya.

Dharmera byapare yara tomadera birud'dhe lara'i kareni ebam tomaderake desa theke bahiskrta kareni, tadera prati sadacarana o inasapha karate allaha tomaderake nisedha karena na. Niscaya allaha inasaphakariderake bhalabasena.

Allaha kebala tadera sathe bandhutba karate nisedha karena, yara dharmera byapare tomadera birud'dhe yud'dha kareche, tomaderake desa theke bahiskrta kareche ebam bahiskarakarye sahayata kareche. Yara tadera sathe bandhutba kare tara'i jalema.

Muminagana, yakhana tomadera kache imanadara narira hijarata kare agamana kare, takhana taderake pariksa kara. Allaha tadera imana samparke samyaka abagata achena. Yadi tomara jana ye, tara imanadara, tabe ara taderake kapheradera kache pherata pathi'o na. Era kapheradera jan'ye halala naya ebam kapherara edera jan'ye halala naya. Kapherara ya byaya kareche, ta tadera diye da'o. Tomara, e'i nariderake prapya moharana diye bibaha karale tomadera aparadha habe na. Tomara kaphera naridera sathe dampatya samparka bajaya rekho na. Tomara ya byaya karecha, ta ceye na'o ebam tara'o ceye nibe ya tara byaya kareche. Eta allahara bidhana; tini tomadera madhye phayasala karena. Allaha sarbajna prajnamaya.

Tomadera stridera madhye yadi ke'u hatachara haye kapheradera kache theke yaya, atahpara tomara suyoga pa'o, takhana yadera stri hatachara haye geche, taderake tadera byayakrta arthera samaparimana artha pradana kara ebam allahake bhaya kara, yara prati tomara bisbasa rakha.

He nabi, imanadara narira yakhana apanara kache ese anugatyera sapatha kare ye, tara allahara sathe ka'uke sarika karabe na, curi karabe na, byabhicara karabe na, tadera santanaderake hatya karabe na, jaraja santanake sbamira aurasa theke apana garbhajata santana bale mithya dabi karabe na ebam bhala kaje apanara abadhyata karabe na, takhana tadera anugatya grahana karuna ebam tadera jan'ye allahara kache ksama prarthana karuna. Niscaya allaha ksamasila atyanta dayalu.
Muminagana, allaha ye jatira prati rusta, tomara tadera sathe bandhutba karo na. Tara parakala samparke nirasa haye geche yemana kabarastha kapherara nirasa haye geche.
Nabhomandale o bhumandale ya kichu ache, saba'i allahara pabitrata ghosana kare. Tini parakranta prajnabana.
Muminagana! Tomara ya kara na, ta kena bala
tomara ya kara na, ta bala allahara kache khuba'i asantosajanaka.
Allaha taderake bhalabasena, yara tamra pathe saribad'dhabhabe lara'i kare, yena tara sisagalano pracira.

Smarana kara, yakhana musa (ah) tamra sampradayake balalah he amara sampradaya, tomara kena amake kasta da'o, athaca tomara jana ye, ami tomadera kache allahara rasula. Atahpara tara yakhana bakrata abalambana karala, takhana allaha tadera antarake bakra kare dilena. Allaha papacari sampradayake pathapradarsana karena na.

Smarana kara, yakhana mariyama-tanaya isa (ah) balalah he bani isara'ila! Ami tomadera kache allahara prerita rasula, amara purbabarti ta'oratera ami satyayanakari ebam ami emana ekajana rasulera susambadadata, yini amara pare agamana karabena. Tamra nama ahamada. Atahpara yakhana se spasta pramanadi niye agamana karala, takhana tara balalah e to eka prakasya yadu.
Ye byakti isalamera dike ahuta haye'o allaha samparke mithya bale; tara ca'ite adhika yalema ara ke? Allaha yalema sampradayake patha pradarsana karena na.
Tara mukhera phumtkare allahara alo nibhiye dite caya. Allaha tamra aloke purnarupe bikasita karabena yadi'o kapherara ta apachanda kare.
Tini tamra rasulake patha nirdesa o satyadharma niye prerana karechena, yate eke sabadharmera upara prabala kare dena yadi'o musarikara ta apachanda kare.
Muminagana, ami ki tomaderake emana eka banijyera sandhana diba, ya tomaderake yantranadayaka sasti theke mukti debe
ta e'i ye, tomara allaha o tamra rasulera prati bisbasa sthapana karabe ebam allahara pathe nijedera dhana-sampada o jibanapana kare jehada karabe. Eta'i tomadera jan'ye uttama; yadi tomara bojha.
Tini tomadera paparasi ksama karabena ebam emana jannate dakhila karabena, yara padadese nadi prabahita ebam basabasera jannate uttama basagrhe. Eta mahasaphalya.
Ebam ara'o ekati anugraha dibena, ya tomara pachanda kara. Allahara paksa theke sahayya ebam asanna bijaya. Muminaderake era susambada dana karuna.

Muminagana, tomara allahara sahayyakari haye ya'o, yemana isa ibane-mariyama tara sisyabargake balechila, allahara pathe ke amara sahayyakari habe? Sisyabarga balechilah amara allahara pathe sahayyakari. Atahpara bani-isara'ilera ekadala bisbasa sthapana karala ebam ekadala kaphera haye gela. Yara bisbasa sthapana karechila, ami taderake tadera satrudera mokabelaya sakti yogalama, phale tara bijayi hala.
Rajyadhipati, pabitra, parakramasali o prajnamaya allahara pabitrata ghosana kare, ya kichu ache nabhomandale o ya kichu ache bhumandale.

Tini'i niraksaradera madhya theke ekajana rasula prerana karechena, yini tadera kache patha karena tara ayatasamuha, taderake pabitra karena ebam siksa dena kitaba o hikamata. Itipurbe tara chila ghora pathabhrastataya lipta.
E'i rasula prerita hayechena an'ya ara'o lokadera jan'ye, yara ekhana'o tadera sathe milita hayani. Tini parakramasali, prajnamaya.
Eta allahara krpa, yake iccha tini ta dana karena. Allaha mahakrpasila.

Yaderake ta'orata deya hayechila, atahpara tara tara anusarana kareni, tadera drstanta se'i gadha, ye pustaka bahana kare, yara allahara ayatasamuhake mithya bale, tadera drstanta kata nikrsta. Allaha jalema sampradayake patha pradarsana karena na.
Baluna he ihudigana, yadi tomara dabi kara ye, tomara'i allahara bandhu-an'ya kona manaba naya, tabe tomara mrtyu kamana kara yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o.
Tara nijedera krtakarmera karane kakhana'o mrtyu kamana karabe na. Allaha jalemadera samparke samyaka abagata achena.

Baluna, tomara ye mrtyu theke palayanapara, se'i mrtyu abasya'i tomadera mukhamukhi habe, atahpara tomara adrsya, drsyera jnani allahara kache upasthita habe. Tini tomaderake janiye dibena sesaba karma, ya tomara karate.
Muminagana, juma'ara dine yakhana namayera ayana deya haya, takhana tomara allahara smaranera pane tbara kara ebam becakena bandha kara. Eta tomadera jan'ye uttama yadi tomara bujha.
Atahpara namaya samapta hale tomara prthibite chariye para ebam allahara anugraha talasa kara o allahake adhika smarana kara, yate tomara saphalakama ha'o.

Tara yakhana kona byabasayera suyoga athaba krirakautuka dekhe takhana apanake damrano abasthaya rekhe tara sedike chute yaya. Balunah allahara kache ya ache, ta krirakautuka o byabasaya apeksa utkrsta. Allaha sarbottama riyikadata.

Munaphikara apanara kache ese baleh amara saksya dicchi ye apani niscaya'i allahara rasula. Allaha janena ye, apani abasya'i allahara rasula ebam allaha saksya dicchena ye, munaphikara abasya'i mithyabadi.
Tara tadera sapathasamuhake dhalarupe byabahara kare. Atahpara tara allahara pathe badha srsti kare. Tara ya karache, ta khuba'i manda.
Eta ejan'ya ye, tara bisbasa karara para punaraya kaphera hayeche. Phale tadera antare mohara mere deya hayeche. Ata'eba tara bujhe na.

Apani yakhana taderake dekhena, takhana tadera dehabayaba apanara kache pritikara mane haya. Ara yadi tara katha bale, tabe apani tadera katha sunena. Tara pracire thekano kathasadrsya. Pratyeka soragolake tara nijedera birud'dhe mane kare. Tara'i satru, ata'eba tadera samparke satarka hona. Dhbansa karuna allaha taderake. Tara kothaya bibhranta hacche
Yakhana taderake bala hayah tomara esa, allahara rasula tomadera jan'ya ksamaprarthana karabena, takhana tara matha ghuriye neya ebam apani taderake dekhena ye, tara ahankara kare mukha phiriye neya.
Apani tadera jan'ye ksamaprarthana karuna athaba na karuna, ubhaya'i samana. Allaha kakhana'o taderake ksama karabena na. Allaha papacari sampradayake pathapradarsana karena na.
Tara'i baleh allahara rasulera sahacarye yara ache tadera jan'ye byaya karo na. Pariname tara apana-apani sare yabe. Bhu o nabhomandalera dhana-bhandara allahara'i kintu munaphikara ta bojhe na.
Tara'i baleh amara yadi madinaya pratyabartana kari tabe sekhana theke sabala abasya'i durbalake bahiskrta karabe. Sakti to allaha tamra rasula o muminadera'i kintu munaphikara ta jane na.
Muminagana! Tomadera dhana-sampada o santana-santati yena tomaderake allahara smarana theke gaphela na kare. Yara e karane gaphela haya, tara'i to ksatigrasta.

Ami tomaderake ya diyechi, ta theke mrtyu asara age'i byaya kara. An'yathaya se balabeh he amara palanakarta, amake ara'o kichukala abakasa dile na kena? Tahale ami sadaka karatama ebam satkarmidera antarbhukta hatama.
Pratyeka byaktira nirdharita samaya yakhana upasthita habe, takhana allaha ka'uke abakasa debena na. Tomara ya kara, allaha se bisaye khabara rakhena.
Nabhomandala o bhumandale ya kichu ache, saba'i allahara pabitrata ghosana kare. Rajatba tamra'i ebam prasansa tamra'i. Tini sarbabisaye sarbasaktimana.
Tini'i tomaderake srsti karechena, atahpara tomadera madhye ke'u kaphera ebam ke'u mumina. Tomara ya kara, allaha ta dekhena.
Tini nabhomandala o bhumandalake yathayathabhabe srsti karechena ebam tomaderake akrti dana karechena, atahpara sundara karechena tomadera akrti. Tamra'i kache pratyabartana.
Nabhomandala o bhumandale ya ache, tini ta janena. Tini ara'o janena tomara ya gopane kara ebam ya prakasye kara. Allaha antarera bisayadi samparke samyaka jnata.
Tomadera purbe yara kaphera chila, tadera brttanta ki tomadera kache paucheni? Tara tadera karmera sasti asbadana kareche, ebam tadera jan'ye rayeche yantranadayaka sasti.

Eta e karane ye, tadera kache tadera rasulagana prakasya nidarsanabalisaha agamana karale tara balatah manusa'i ki amaderake pathapradarsana karabe? Atahpara tara kaphera haye gela ebam mukha phiriye nila. Ete allahara kichu ase yaya na. Allaha amukhapeksi prasansita.

Kapherara dabi kare ye, tara kakhana'o punarut'thita habe na. Baluna, abasya'i habe, amara palanakartara kasama, tomara niscaya purut'thita habe. Atahpara tomaderake abahita kara habe ya tomara karate. Eta allahara pakse sahaja.
Ata'eba tomara allaha tamra rasula ebam abatirna nurera prati bisbasa sthapana kara. Tomara ya kara, se bisaye allaha samyaka abagata.

Sedina arthat, samabesera dina allaha tomaderake samabeta karabena. E dina hara-jitera dina. Ye byakti allahara prati bisbasa sthapana kare ebam satkarma sampadana kare, allaha tara papasamuha mocana karabena ebam take jannate dakhila karabena. Yara taladese nirjharinisamuha prabahita habe, tara tathaya cirakala basabasa karabe. Eta'i mahasaphalya.
Ara yara kaphera ebam amara ayatasamuhake mithya bale, tara'i jahannamera adhibasi, tara tathaya anantakala thakabe. Kata'i na manda pratyabartanasthala eta.
Allahara nirdesa byatireke kona bipada ase na ebam ye allahara prati bisbasa kare, tini tara antarake satpatha pradarsana karena. Allaha sarbabisaye samyaka parijnata.
Tomara allahara anugatya kara ebam rasulullahara anugatya kara. Yadi tomara mukha phiriye na'o, tabe amara rasulera dayitba kebala kholakhuli pauche deya.
Allaha tini byatita kona mabuda ne'i. Ata'eba muminagana allahara upara bharasa karuka.
He muminagana, tomadera kona kona stri o santana-santati tomadera dusamana. Ata'eba tadera byapare satarka thaka. Yadi marjana kara, upeksa kara, ebam ksama kara, tabe allaha ksamasila, karunamaya.
Tomadera dhana-sampada o santana-santati to kebala pariksasbarupa. Ara allahara kache rayeche mahapuraskara.
Ata'eba tomara yathasadhya allahake bhaya kara, suna, anugatya kara ebam byaya kara. Eta tomadera jan'ye kalyanakara. Yara manera karpan'ya theke mukta, tara'i saphalakama.
Yadi tomara allahake uttama rna dana kara, tini tomadera jan'ye ta dbiguna kare debena ebam tomaderake ksama karabena. Allaha gunagrahi, sahanasila.
Tini drsya o adrsyera jnani, parakranta, prajnamaya.

He nabi, tomara yakhana striderake talaka dite ca'o, takhana taderake talaka diyo iddatera prati laksya rekhe ebam iddata ganana karo. Tomara tomadera palanakarta allahake bhaya karo. Taderake tadera grha theke bahiskara karo na ebam tara'o yena bera na haya yadi na tara kona suspasta nirlajja kaje lipta haya. Egulo allahara nirdharita sima. Ye byakti allahara simalanghana kare, se nijera'i anista kare. Se jane na, hayato allaha e'i talakera para kona natuna upaya kare debena.

Atahpara tara yakhana tadera iddatakale paumche, takhana taderake yathopayukta panthaya rekhe debe athaba yathopayukta panthaya chere debe ebam tomadera madhya theke du’jana nirbharayogya lokake saksi rakhabe. Tomara allahara uddesye saksya dibe. Etaddbara ye byakti allaha o parakale bisbasa kare, take upadesa deya hacche. Ara ye allahake bhaya kare, allaha tara jan'ye niskrtira patha kare debena.

Ebam take tara dharanatita jayaga theke riyika debena. Ye byakti allahara upara bharasa kare tara jan'ye tini'i yathesta. Allaha tara kaja purna karabena. Allaha sabakichura jan'ye ekati parimana sthira kare rekhechena.

Tomadera stridera madhye yadera rtubarti ha'oyara asa ne'i, tadera byapare sandeha hale tadera iddata habe tina masa. Ara yara ekhana'o rtura bayase paumcheni, tadera'o anurupa iddatakala habe. Garbhabarti naridera iddatakala santanaprasaba paryanta. Ye allahake bhaya kare, allaha tara kaja sahaja kare dena.
Eta allahara nirdesa, ya tini tomadera prati nayila karechena. Ye allahake bhaya kare, allaha tara papa mocana karena ebam take mahapuraskara dena.

Tomara tomadera samartha?2437;Nuyayi yerupa grhe basa kara, taderake'o basabasera jan'ye serupa grha da'o. Taderake kasta diye sankatapanna karo na. Yadi tara garbhabati haya, tabe santanaprasaba paryanta tadera byayabhara bahana karabe. Yadi tara tomadera santanaderake stan'yadana kare, tabe taderake prapya parisramika debe ebam e samparke paraspara sanyatabhabe paramarsa karabe. Tomara yadi paraspara jeda kara, tabe an'ya nari stan'yadana karabe.

Bittasali byakti tara bitta anuyayi byaya karabe. Ye byakti simita parimane riyikaprapta, se allaha ya diyechena, ta theke byaya karabe. Allaha yake ya diyechena, tadapeksa besi byaya karara adesa ka'uke karena na. Allaha kastera para sukha debena.
Aneka janapada tadera palanakarta o tamra rasulaganera adesa aman'ya karechila, atahpara ami taderake kathora hisabe dhrta karechilama ebam taderake bhisana sasti diyechilama.
Atahpara tadera karmera sasti asbadana karala ebam tadera karmera parinama ksati'i chila.
Allaha tadera jan'ye yantranadayaka sasti prastata rekhechena ata'eba, he bud'dhimanagana, yara imana enecha, tomara allahake bhaya kara. Allaha tomadera prati upadesa nayila karechena.

Ekajana rasula, yini tomadera kache allahara suspasta ayatasamuha patha karena, yate bisbasi o satkarmaparayanadera andhakara theke alote anayana karena. Ye allahara prati bisbasa sthapana kare o satkarma sampadana kare, tini take dakhila karabena jannate, yara taladese nadi prabahita, tathaya tara cirakala thakabe. Allaha take uttama riyika debena.
Allaha saptakasa srsti karechena ebam prthibi'o se'i parimane, esabera madhye tamra adesa abatirna haya, yate tomara janate para ye, allaha sarbasaktimana ebam sabakichu tamra gocaribhuta.
He nabi, allaha apanara jan'ye ya halala karachena, apani apanara striderake khusi karara jan'ye ta nijera jan'ye harama karechena kena? Allaha ksamasila, dayamaya.
Allaha tomadera jan'ye kasama theke abyahati labhera upaya nirdharana kare diyechena. Allaha tomadera malika. Tini sarbajna, prajnamaya.

Yakhana nabi tamra ekajana strira kache ekati katha gopane balalena, atahpara stri yakhana ta bale dila ebam allaha nabike ta janiye dilena, takhana nabi se bisaye strike kichu balalena ebam kichu balalena na. Nabi yakhana ta strike balalena, takhana stri balalenah ke apanake e samparke abahita karala? Nabi balalena,h yini sarbajna, oyakiphahala, tini amake abahita karechena.

Tomadera antara an'yayera dike jhumke pareche bale yadi tomara ubhaye ta'oba kara, tabe bhala katha. Ara yadi nabira birud'dhe eke aparake sahayya kara, tabe jene rekha allaha jibara'ila ebam satkarmaparayana muminagana tamra sahaya. Uparantuta pheresatagana'o tamra sahayyakari.

Yadi nabi tomadera sakalake parityaga karena, tabe sambhabatah tamra palanakarta tamke paribarte dibena tomadera ca'ite uttama stri, yara habe ajnabaha, imanadara, namayi ta'obakarini, ebadatakarini, royadara, akumari o kumari.

Muminagana, tomara nijederake ebam tomadera paribara-parijanake se'i agni theke raksa kara, yara indhana habe manusa o prastara, yate niyojita ache pasana hrdaya, kathorasbabhaba pheresatagana. Tara allaha ta’ala ya adesa karena, ta aman'ya kare na ebam ya karate adesa kara haya, ta'i kare.
He kaphera sampradaya, tomara aja oyara pesa karo na. Tomaderake tara'i pratiphala deya habe, ya tomara karate.

Muminagana! Tomara allaha ta’alara kache ta'oba kara-antarika ta'oba. Asa kara yaya, tomadera palanakarta tomadera manda karmasamuha mocana kare debena ebam tomaderake dakhila karabena jannate, yara taladese nadi prabahita. Sedina allaha nabi ebam tamra bisbasi sahacaraderake apadastha karabena na. Tadera nura tadera samane o danadike chutochuti karabe. Tara balabeh he amadera palanakarta, amadera nurake purna kare dina ebam amaderake ksama karuna. Niscaya apani sabakichura upara sarba saktimana.
He nabi! Kaphera o munaphikadera birud'dhe jehada karuna ebam tadera prati kathora hona. Tadera thikana jahannama. Seta kata'i na nikrsta sthana.

Allaha ta’ala kapheradera jan'ye nuha-patni o luta-patnira drstanta barnana karechena. Tara chila amara du'i dharmaparayana bandara grhe. Atahpara tara tadera sathe bisbasaghatakata karala. Phale nuha o luta taderake allaha ta’alara kabala theke raksa karate parala na ebam taderake bala halah jahannamidera sathe jahanname cale ya'o.

Allaha ta’ala muminadera jan'ye phera'una-patnira drstanta barnana karechena. Se balalah he amara palanakarta! Apanara sannikate jannate amara jan'ye ekati grha nirmana karuna, amake phera'una o tara duskarma theke ud'dhara karuna ebam amake yalema sampradaya theke mukti dina.

Ara drstanta barnana karechena emarana-tanaya mariyamera, ye tara satitba bajaya rekhechila. Atahpara ami tara madhye amara paksa theke jibana phumke diyechilama ebam se tara palanakartara bani o kitabake satye parinata karechila. Se chila binaya prakasakarinidera ekajana.
Punyamaya tini, yamra hate rajatba. Tini sabakichura upara sarbasaktimana.
Yini srsti karechena marana o jibana, yate tomaderake pariksa karena-ke tomadera madhye karme srestha? Tini parakramasali, ksamamaya.
Tini sapta akasa stare stare srsti karechena. Tumi karunamaya allaha ta’alara srstite kona taphata dekhate pabe na. Abara drstiphera'o; kona phatala dekhate pa'o ki
atahpara tumi bara bara takiye dekha-tomara drsti byartha o parisranta haye tomara dike phire asabe.
Ami sarbanimna akasake pradipamala dbara susajjata karechi; seguloke sayatanadera jan'ye ksepanastrabat karechi ebam prastuta kare rekhechi tadera jan'ye jalanta agnira sasti.
Yara tadera palanakartake asbikara kareche tadera jan'ye rayeche jahannamera sasti. Seta kata'i na nikrsta sthana.
Yakhana tara tathaya niksipta habe, takhana tara utksipta garjana sunate pabe.
Krodhe jahannama yena phete parabe. Yakhana'i tate kona sampradaya niksipta habe takhana taderake tara sipahira jijnasa karabe. Tomadera kache ki kona satarkakari agamana kareni
tara balabeh hyam amadera kache satarkakari agamana karechila, atahpara amara mithyaropa karechilama ebam balechilamah allaha ta’ala kona kichu najila karenani. Tomara mahabibhrantite pare rayecha.
Tara ara'o balabeh yadi amara sunatama athaba bud'dhi khatatama, tabe amara jahannamabasidera madhye thakatama na.
Atahpara tara tadera aparadha sbikara karabe. Jahannamira dura hoka.
Niscaya yara tadera palanakartake na dekhe bhaya kare, tadera jan'ye rayeche ksama o mahapuraskara.
Tomara tomadera katha gopane bala athaba prakasye bala, tini to antarera bisayadi samparke samyaka abagata.
Yini srsti karechena, tini ki kare janabena na? Tini suksnajnani, samyaka jnata.
Tini tomadera jan'ye prthibike sugama karechena, ata'eba, tomara tara kamdhe bicarana kara ebam tamra deya riyika ahara kara. Tamra'i kache punarujjibana habe.
Tomara ki bhabanamukta haye gecha ye, akase yini achena tini tomaderake bhugarbhe bilina kare debena, atahpara ta kampate thakabe.
Na tomara niscinta haye gecha ye, akase yini achena, tini tomadera upara prastara brsti barsana karabena, atahpara tomara janate parabe kemana chila amara satarkabani.
Tadera purbabartira mithyaropa karechila, atahpara kata kathora hayechila amara asbikrti.
Tara ki laksya kare na, tadera mathara upara uranta paksikulera prati pakha bistarakari o pakha sankocanakari? Rahamana allaha-i taderake sthira rakhena. Tini sarba-bisaya dekhena.
Rahamana allaha ta’ala byatita tomadera kona sain'ya ache ki, ye tomaderake sahayya karabe? Kapherara bibhrantite'i patita ache.
Tini yadi riyika bandha kare dena, tabe ke ache, ye tomaderake riyika dibe baram tara abadhyata o bimukhataya dube rayeche.
Ye byakti upura haye mukhe bhara diye cale, se-i ki sat pathe cale, na se byakti ye soja haye saralapathe cale
baluna, tini'i tomaderake srsti karechena ebam diyechena karna, caksu o antara. Tomara alpa'i krtajnata prakasa kara.
Baluna, tini'i tomaderake prthibite bistrta karechena ebam tamra'i kache tomara samabeta habe.
Kapherara baleh e'i pratisruti kabe habe, yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o
baluna, era jnana allaha ta’alara kache'i ache. Ami to kebala prakasya satarkakari.
Yakhana tara se'i pratisrutike asanna dekhabe takhana kapheradera mukhamandala malina haye parabe ebam bala habeh eta'i to tomara ca'ite.
Baluna, tomara ki bhebe dekhecha-yadi allaha ta’ala amake o amara sangiderake dhbansa karena athaba amadera prati daya karena, tabe kapheraderake ke yantranadayaka sasti theke raksa karabe
Baluna, tini parama karunamaya, amara tate bisbasa rakhi ebam tamra'i upara bharasa kari. Sattbara'i tomara janate parabe, ke prakasya patha-bhrastataya ache.
Baluna, tomara bhebe dekhecha ki, yadi tomadera pani bhugarbhera gabhire cale yaya, tabe ke tomaderake sarabaraha karabe panira srotadhara
nuna. Sapatha kalamera ebam se'i bisayera ya tara lipibad'dha kare
apanara palanakartara anugrahe apani um'mada nana.
Apanara jan'ye abasya'i rayeche asesa puraskara.
Apani abasya'i mahana caritrera adhikari.
Sattbara'i apani dekhe nibena ebam tara'o dekhe nibe.
Ke tomadera madhye bikaragrasta.
Apanara palanakarta samyaka janena ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche ebam tini janena yara satpatha prapta.
Ata'eba, apani mithyaropakaridera anugatya karabena na.
Tara caya yadi apani namaniya hana, tabe tara'o namaniya habe.
Ye adhika sapatha kare, ye lanchita, apani tara anugatya karabena na.
Ye pascate ninda kare ekera katha aparera nikata lagiye phire.
Ye bhala kaje badha deya, se simalanghana kare, se papistha
kathora sbabhaba, tadupari kukhyata
e karane ye, se dhana-sampada o santana santatira adhikari.
Tara kache amara ayata patha kara hale se bale; sekalera upakatha.
Ami tara nasika dagiye diba.
Ami taderake pariksa karechi, yemana pariksa karechi udyana'oyaladera, yakhana tara sapatha karechila ye, sakale baganera phala aharana karabe
inasa'allaha na bale.
Atahpara apanara palanakartara paksa theke bagane eka bipada ese patita halo. Yakhana tara nidrita chila.
Phale sakala paryanta haye gela chinnabicchinna trnasama.
Sakale tara eke aparake deke balala
tomara yadi phala aharana karate ca'o, tabe sakala sakala ksete cala.
Atahpara tara calala phisaphisa kare katha balate balate
adya yena kona misakina byakti tomadera kache bagane prabesa karate na pare.
Tara sakale laphiye laphiye sajore ra'oyana hala.
Atahpara yakhana tara bagana dekhala, takhana balalah amara to patha bhule gechi.
Baram amara to kapalapora
tadera uttama byakti balalah ami ki tomaderake balini? Ekhana'o tomara allaha ta’alara pabitrata barnana karacho na kena
tara balalah amara amadera palanakartara pabitrata ghosana karachi, niscita'i amara simalanghanakari chilama.
Atahpara tara eke aparake bhatrsana karate lagala.
Tara balalah haya! Durbhoga amadera amara chilama simatikramakari.
Sambhabatah amadera palanakarta paribarte era ca'ite uttama bagana amaderake dibena. Amara amadera palanakartara kache asabadi.
Sasti ebhabe'i ase ebam parakalera sasti ara'o gurutara; yadi tara janata
mottakidera jan'ye tadera palanakartara kache rayeche neyamatera jannata.
Ami ki ajnabahaderake aparadhidera n'yaya ganya karaba
tomadera ki hala? Tomara kemana sid'dhanta diccha
tomadera ki kona kitaba ache, ya tomara patha kara.
Tate tomara ya pachanda kara, ta'i pa'o
na tomara amara kacha thekekeyamata paryanta balabat kona sapatha niyecha ye, tomara ta'i pabe ya tomara sid'dhanta karabe
apani taderake jijnasa karuna tadera ke e bisaye dayitbasila
na tadera kona sarika upasya ache? Thakale tadera sarika upasyaderake upasthita karuka yadi tara satyabadi haya.
Gocha paryanta pa kholara dinera katha smarana kara, sedina taderake sejada karate ahabana janano habe, atahpara tara saksama habe na.
Tadera drsti abanata thakabe; tara lanchanagrasta habe, athaca yakhana tara sustha o sbabhabika abasthaya chila, takhana taderake sejada karate ahabana janano hata.
Ata'eba, yara e'i kalamake mithya bale, taderake amara hate chere dina, ami emana dhire dhire taderake jahannamera dike niye yaba ye, tara janate parabe na.
Ami taderake samaya de'i. Niscaya amara kausala majabuta.
Apani ki tadera kache parisramika cana? Phale tadera upara jarimanara bojha parache
na tadera kache gayabera khabara ache? Atahpara tara ta lipibad'dha kare.
Apani apanara palanakartara adesera apeksaya sabara karuna ebam macha'oyala i'unusera mata habena na, yakhana se duhkhakula mane prarthana karechila.
Yadi tara palanakartara anugraha take samala na dita, tabe se nindita abasthaya janasun'ya prantare niksipta hata.
Atahpara tara palanakarta take manonita karalena ebam take satkarmidera antarbhukta kare nilena.
Kapherara yakhana kora'ana sune, takhana tara tadera drsti dbara yena apanake achara diye phele dibe ebam tara baleh se to ekajana pagala.
Athaca e'i kora'ana to bisbajagatera jan'ye upadesa bai naya.
Suniscita bisaya.
Suniscita bisaya ki
apani ki kichu janena, se'i suniscita bisaya ki
ada o samuda gotra mahapralayake mithya balechila.
Atahpara samuda gotrake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pralayankara biparyaya dbara.
Ebam ada gotrake dhbansa kara hayechila eka pracanda jhanjabayu
ya tini prabahita karechilena tadera upara sata ratri o ata dibasa paryanta abirama. Apani taderake dekhatena ye, tara asara kharjura kandera n'yaya bhupatita haye rayeche.
Apani tadera kona astitba dekhate pana ki
phera'una, tamra purbabartira ebam ulte ya'oya bastibasira gurutara papa karechila.
Tara tadera palanakartara rasulake aman'ya karechila. Phale tini taderake kathorahaste pakara'o karalena.
Yakhana jalocchbasa hayechila, takhana ami tomaderake calanta nauyane arohana kariyechilama.
Yate e ghatana tomadera jan'ye smrtira bisaya ebam kana etake upadesa grahanera upayogi rupe grahana kare.
Yakhana singaya phutkara deya habe-ekati matra phutkara
Ebam prthibi o parbatamala uttolita habe o curna-bicurna kare deya habe
sedina keyamata sanghatita habe.
Sedina akasa bidirna habe o biksipta habe.
Ebam pheresatagana akasera prantadese thakabe o ata jana pheresata apanara palanakartara arasake tadera urdhbe bahana karabe.
Sedina tomaderake upasthita kara habe. Tomadera kona kichu gopana thakabe na.
Atahpara yara amalanama dana hate deya habe, se balabeh na'o, tomara'o amalanama pare dekha.
Ami janatama ye, amake hisabera sam'mukhina hate habe.
Atahpara se sukhi jibana-yapana karabe
su'ucca jannate.
Tara phalasamuha abanamita thakabe.
Bigata dine tomara ya prerana karechile, tara pratidane tomara kha'o ebam pana kara trpti sahakare.
Yara amalanama tara bama hate deya habe, se balabeh haya amaya yadi amara amala nama na deya hato.
Ami yadi na janatama amara hisaba
haya, amara mrtyu'i yadi sesa hata.
Amara dhana-sampada amara kona upakare asala na.
Amara ksamata'o barabada haye gela.
Pheresataderake bala habeh dhara eke galaya beri pariye da'o
atahpara niksepa kara jahanname.
Atahpara take srnkhalita kara sattara gaja dirgha eka sikale.
Niscaya se mahana allahate bisbasi chila na.
Ebam misakinake aharya dite utsahita karata na.
Ata'eba, ajakera dina ekhane tara kona suhuda na'i.
Ebam kona khadya na'i, ksata-nihsrta pumja byatita.
Gonahagara byatita ke'u eta khabe na.
Tomara ya dekha, ami tara sapatha karachi.
Ebam ya tomara dekha na, tara
niscaya'i e'i kora'ana ekajana sam'manita rasulera anita.
Ebam eta kona kabira kalama naya; tomara kama'i bisbasa kara.
Ebam eta kona atindriyabadira katha naya; tomara kama'i anudhabana kara.
Eta bisbapalanakartara kacha theke abatirna.
Se yadi amara name kona katha racana karata
tabe ami tara daksina hasta dhare phelatama
atahpara kete ditama tara griba.
Tomadera ke'u take raksa karate parate na.
Eta khodabhirudera jan'ye abasya'i ekati upadesa.
Ami jani ye, tomadera madhye ke'u ke'u mithyaropa karabe.
Niscaya eta kapheradera jan'ye anutapera karana.
Niscaya eta niscita satya.
Ata'eba, apani apanara mahana palanakartara namera pabitrata barnana karuna.
Ekabyakti ca'ila, se'i ayaba sanghatita hoka ya abadharita
kapheradera jan'ye, yara pratirodhakari ke'u ne'i.
Ta asabe allaha ta’alara paksa theke, yini samunnata martabara adhikari.
Pheresatagana ebam ruha allaha ta’alara dike urdhbagami haya emana ekadine, yara parimana pancasa hajara bachara.
Ata'eba, apani uttama sabara karuna.
Tara e'i ayabake suduraparahata mane kare
ara ami eke asanna dekhachi.
Sedina akasa habe galita tamara mata.
Ebam parbatasamuha habe rangina pasamera mata
bandhu bandhura khabara nibe na.
Yadi'o eke aparake dekhate pabe. Sedina gonahagara byakti panasbarupa dite ca'ibe tara santana-santatike
tara strike, tara bhratake
tara gosthike, yara take asraya dita.
Ebam prthibira sabakichuke, atahpara nijeke raksa karate ca'ibe.
Kakhana'i naya. Niscaya eta lelihana agni.
Ya camara tule dibe.
Se se'i byaktike dakabe ye satyera prati prsthapradarsana karechila o bimukha hayechila.
Sampada punjibhuta karechila, atahpara agaliye rekhechila.
Manusa to srjita hayeche bhirurupe.
Yakhana take anista sparsa kare, takhana se ha-hutasa kare.
Ara yakhana kalyanaprapta haya, takhana krpana haye yaya.
Tabe tara sbatantra, yara namaya adaya kari.
Yara tadera namaye sarbaksanika kayema thake.
Ebam yadera dhana-sampade nirdharita haka ache
yanchakari o bancitera
ebam yara pratiphala dibasake satya bale bisbasa kare.
Ebam yara tadera palanakartara sastira samparke bhita-kampita.
Niscaya tadera palanakartara sasti theke nihsanka thaka yaya na.
Ebam yara tadera yauna-angake sanyata rakhe
kintu tadera stri athaba malikanabhukta dasidera belaya tiraskrta habe na.
Ata'eba, yara edera chara an'yake kamana kare, tara'i simalanghanakari.
Ebam yara tadera amanata o angikara raksa kare
ebam yara tadera saksyadane sarala-nisthabana
ebam yara tadera namaye yatnabana
tara'i jannate sam'manita habe.
Ata'eba, kapheradera ki hala ye, tara apanara dike urdhbasbase chute asache.
Dana o bamadika theke dale dale.
Tadera pratyeke'i ki asa kare ye, take neyamatera jannate dakhila kara habe
kakhana'i naya, ami taderake emana bastu dbara srsti karechi, ya tara jane.
Ami sapatha karachi udayacala o astacalasamuhera palanakartara, niscaya'i ami saksama
tadera paribarte utkrstatara manusa srsti karate ebam eta amara sadhyera atita naya.
Ata'eba, apani taderake chere dina, tara bakabitanda o krira-kautuka karuka se'i dibasera sam'mukhina ha'oya paryanta, ye dibasera oyada tadera sathe kara hacche.
Se dina tara kabara theke drutabege bera habe, yena tara kona eka laksyasthalera dike chute yacche.
Tadera drsti thakabe abanamita; tara habe hinatagrasta. Eta'i se'idina, yara oyada taderake deya hata.
Ami nuhake prerana karechilama tamra sampradayera prati ekatha baleh tumi tomara sampradayake satarka kara, tadera prati marmantada sasti asara age.
Se balala, he amara sampradaya! Ami tomadera jan'ye spasta satarkakari.
E bisaye ye, tomara allaha ta’alara ebadata kara, tamke bhaya kara ebam amara anugatya kara.
Allaha ta’ala tomadera papasamuha ksama karabena ebam nirdista samaya paryanta abakasa dibena. Niscaya allaha ta’alara nirdistakala yakhana habe, takhana abakasa deya habe na, yadi tomara ta janate
Se balalah he amara palanakarta! Ami amara sampradayake dibaratri da'oyata diyechi
kintu amara da'oyata tadera palayanake'i brd'dhi kareche.

Ami yatabara'i taderake da'oyata diyechi, yate apani taderake ksama karena, tatabara'i tara kane anguli diyeche, mukhamandala bastrabrta kareche, jeda kareche ebam khuba aud'dhatya pradarsana kareche.
Atahpara ami taderake prakasye da'oyata diyechi
atahpara ami ghosana sahakare pracara karechi ebam gopane cupisare balechi.
Atahpara balechih tomara tomadera palanakartara ksama prarthana kara. Tini atyanta ksamasila.
Tini tomadera upara ajasra brstidhara chere dibena
tomadera dhana-sampada o santana-santati bariye dibena, tomadera jan'ye udyana sthapana karabena ebam tomadera jan'ye nadinala prabahita karabena.
Tomadera ki hala ye, tomara allaha ta’alara srestatba asa karacha na.
Athaca tini tomaderake bibhinna rakame srsti karechena.
Tomara ki laksya kara na ye, allaha kibhabe sapta akasa stare stare srsti karechena.
Ebam sekhane candrake rekhechena alorupe ebam suryake rekhechena pradiparupe.
Allaha ta’ala tomaderake mrttika theke udagata karechena.
Atahpara tate phiriye nibena ebam abara punarut'thita karabena.
Allaha ta’ala tomadera jan'ye bhumike karechena bichana.
Yate tomara calaphera kara prasasta pathe.
Nuha balalah he amara palanakarta, amara sampradaya amake aman'ya kareche ara anusarana karache emana lokake, yara dhana-sampada o santana-santati kebala tara ksati'i brd'dhi karache.
Ara tara bhayanaka cakranta karache.
Tara balacheh tomara tomadera upasyaderake tyaga karo na ebam tyaga karo na oyada, suya, iyagucha, iya'uka o nasarake.
Athaca tara anekake pathabhrasta kareche. Ata'eba apani jalemadera pathabhrastata'i bariye dina.
Tadera gonahasamuhera daruna taderake nimajjita kara hayeche, atahpara dakhila kara hayeche jahanname. Atahpara tara allaha ta’ala byatita ka'uke sahayyakari payani.
Nuha ara'o balalah he amara palanakarta, apani prthibite kona kaphera grhabasike reha'i dibena na.
Yadi apani taderake reha'i dena, tabe tara apanara bandaderake pathabhrasta karabe ebam janma dite thakabe kebala papacari, kaphera.

He amara palanakarta! Apani amake, amara pita-matake, yara mumina haye amara grhe prabesa kare-taderake ebam mumina purusa o mumina nariderake ksama karuna ebam yalemadera kebala dhbansa'i brd'dhi karuna.
Balunah amara prati ohi nayila kara hayeche ye, jinadera ekati dala kora'ana srabana kareche, atahpara tara balecheh amara bismayakara kora'ana srabana karechi
ya satpatha pradarsana kare. Phale amara tate bisbasa sthapana karechi. Amara kakhana'o amadera palanakartara sathe ka'uke sarika karaba na.
Ebam ara'o bisbasa kari ye, amadera palanakartara mahana maryada sabara urdhbe. Tini kona patni grahana karenani ebam tamra kona santana ne'i.
Amadera madhye nirbodhera allaha ta’ala samparke barabarira kathabarta balata.
Athaca amara mane karatama, manusa o jina kakhana'o allaha ta’ala samparke mithya balate pare na.
Aneka manusa aneka jinera asraya nita, phale tara jinadera atnambharita bariye dita.
Tara dharana karata, yemana tomara manabera dharana kara ye, mrtyura para allaha ta’ala kakhana'o ka'uke punarut'thita karabena na.
Amara akasa paryabeksana karachi, atahpara dekhate peyechi ye, kathora prahari o ulkapinda dbara akasa paripurna.
Amara akasera bibhinna ghamtite sambada srabanarthe basatama. Ekhana ke'u sambada sunate ca'ile se jalanta ulkapinda omt pete thakate dekhe.
Amara jani na prthibibasidera amangala sadhana kara abhista, na tadera palanakarta tadera mangala sadhana karara iccha rakhena.
Amadera ke'u ke'u satkarmaparayana ebam ke'u ke'u erupa naya. Amara chilama bibhinna pathe bibhakta.
Amara bujhate perechi ye, amara prthibite allaha ta’alake parasta karate paraba na ebam palayana kare'o take aparaka karata paraba na.
Amara yakhana supathera nirdesa sunalama, takhana tate bisbasa sthapana karalama. Ata'eba, ye tara palanakartara prati bisbasa kare, se lokasana o jora-jabarera asanka kare na.
Amadera kichusankhyaka ajnabaha ebam kichusankhyaka an'yayakari. Yara ajnabaha haya, tara satpatha beche niyeche.
Ara yara an'yayakari, tara to jahannamera indhana.
Ara e'i pratyadesa kara hayeche ye, tara yadi satyapathe kayema thakata, tabe ami taderake pracura pani barsane sikta karatama.
Yate e byapare taderake pariksa kari. Paksantare ye byakti tara palanakartara smarana theke mukha phiriye neya, tini take udiyamana ayabe paricalita karabena.
Ebam e'i ohi'o kara hayeche ye, masajidasamuha allaha ta’alake smarana karara jan'ya. Ata'eba, tomara allaha ta’alara sathe ka'uke deko na.
Ara yakhana allaha ta’alara banda tamke dakara jan'ye dandayamana hala, takhana aneka jina tara kache bhira jamala.
Balunah ami to amara palanakartake'i daki ebam tamra sathe ka'uke sarika kari na.
Balunah ami tomadera ksati sadhana karara o supathe anayana karara malika na'i.
Balunah allaha ta’alara kabala theke amake ke'u raksa karate parabe na ebam tini byatita ami kona asrayasthala paba na.
Kintu allaha ta’alara bani pauchano o tamra payagama pracara kara'i amara kaja. Ye allaha o tamra rasulake aman'ya kare, tara jan'ye rayeche jahannamera agni. Tathaya tara cirakala thakabe.
Emanaki yakhana tara pratisruta sasti dekhate pabe, takhana tara janate parabe, kara sahayyakari durbala ebam kara sankhya kama.
Balunah ami jani na tomadera pratisruta bisaya asanna na amara palanakarta era jan'ye kona meyada sthira kare rekhechena.
Tini adrsyera jnani. Paranta tini adrsya bisaya kara'o kache prakasa karena na.
Tamra manonita rasula byatita. Takhana tini tara agre o pascate prahari niyukta karena
yate allaha ta’ala jene nena ye, rasulagana tamdera palanakartara payagama pauchiyechena ki na. Rasulaganera kache ya ache, ta tamra jnana-gocara. Tini sabakichura sankhyara hisaba rakhena.
He bastrabrta
ratrite dandayamana hona kichu ansa bada diye
ardharatri athaba tadapeksa kichu kama
athaba tadapeksa besi ebam kora'ana abrtti karuna subin'yasta bhabe o spastabhabe.
Ami apanara prati abatirna karechi gurutbapurna bani.
Niscaya ebadatera jan'ye ratrite utha prabrtti dalane sahayaka ebam spasta uccaranera anukula.
Niscaya dibabhage rayeche apanara dirgha karmabyastata.
Apani apanara palanakartara nama smarana karuna ebam ekagracitte tate magna hona.
Tini purba o pascimera adhikarta. Tini byatita kona upasya ne'i. Ata'eba, tamke'i grahana karuna karmabidhayakarupe.
Kapherara ya bale, tajjan'ye apani sabara karuna ebam sundarabhabe taderake parihara kare caluna.
Bitta-baibhabera adhikari mithyaropakariderake amara hate chere dina ebam taderake kichu abakasa dina.
Niscaya amara kache ache sikala o agnikunda.
Galagraha haye yaya emana khadya ebam yantranadayaka sasti.
Yedina prthibi parbatamala prakampita habe ebam parbatasamuha haye yabe bahamana balukastupa.
Ami tomadera kache ekajana rasulake tomadera jan'ye saksi kare prerana karechi, yemana prerana karechilama phera'unera kache ekajana rasula.
Atahpara phera'una se'i rasulake aman'ya karala, phale ami take kathina sasti diyechi.
Ata'eba, tomara kirupe atnaraksa karabe yadi tomara sedinake asbikara kara, yedina balakake kare diba brd'dha
sedina akasa bidirna habe. Tara pratisruti abasya'i bastabayita habe.
Eta upadesa. Ata'eba, yara iccha, se tara palanakartara dike patha abalambana karuka.

Apanara palanakarta janena, apani ebadatera jan'ye dandayamana hana ratrira praya du’trtiyansa, ardhansa o trtiyansa ebam apanara sangidera ekati dala'o dandayamana haya. Allaha diba o ratri parimapa karena. Tini janena, tomara era purna hisaba rakhate para na. Ata'eba tini tomadera prati ksama parayana hayechena. Kaje'i kora'anera yatatuku tomadera jan'ye sahaja, tatatuku abrtti kara. Tini janena tomadera madhye ke'u ke'u asustha habe, ke'u ke'u allahara anugraha sandhane dese-bidese yabe ebam ke'u ke'u allahara pathe jehade lipta habe. Kaje'i kora'anera yatatuku tomadera jan'ye sahaja tatatuku abrtti kara. Tomara namaya kayema kara, yakata da'o ebam allahake uttama rna da'o. Tomara nijedera jan'ye ya kichu agre pathabe, ta allahara kache uttama akare ebam puraskara hisebe bardhitarupe pabe. Tomara allahara kache ksamaprarthana kara. Niscaya allaha ksamasila, dayalu.
He cadarabrta
uthuna, satarka karuna
apana palanakartara mahatmya ghosana karuna
apana posaka pabitra karuna
ebam apabitrata theke dure thakuna.
Adhika pratidanera asaya an'yake kichu dibena na.
Ebam apanara palanakartara uddese sabara karuna.
Yedina singaya phumka deya habe
sedina habe kathina dina
kapheradera jan'ye eta sahaja naya.
Yake ami anan'ya kare srsti karechi, take amara hate chere dina.
Ami take bipula dhana-sampada diyechi.
Ebam sada sangi putrabarga diyechi
ebam take khuba sacchalata diyechi.
Erapara'o se asa kare ye, ami take ara'o besi de'i.
Kakhana'i naya! Se amara nidarsanasamuhera birud'dhacaranakari.
Ami sattbara'i take sastira pahare arohana karaba.
Se cinta kareche ebam manahsthira kareche
dhbansa hoka se, kirupe se manahsthira kareche
abara dhbansa hoka se, kirupe se manahsthira kareche
se abara drstipata kareche
atahpara se bhrukuncita kareche o mukha bikrta kareche
atahpara prsthapradasana kareche o ahankara kareche.
Erapara balecheh eto loka parasparaya prapta jadu bai naya
eto manusera ukti bai naya.
Ami take dakhila karaba agnite.
Apani ki bujhalena agni ki
eta aksata rakhabe na ebam charabe'o na.
Manusake dagdha karabe.
Era upara niyojita ache unisa (pheresata).

Ami jahannamera tattbabadhayaka pheresata'i rekhechi. Ami kapheraderake pariksa karara jan'ye'i tara e'i sankhya karechi-yate kitabira drrhabisbasi haya, muminadera imana brd'dhi paya ebam kitabira o muminagana sandeha posana na kare ebam yate yadera antare roga ache, tara ebam kapherara bale ye, allaha era dbara ki bojhate ceyechena. Emanibhabe allaha yake iccha pathabhrasta karena ebam yake iccha satpathe calana. Apanara palanakartara bahini samparke ekamatra tini'i janena eta to manusera jan'ye upadesa bai naya.
Kakhana'i naya. Candrera sapatha
sapatha ratrira yakhana tara abasana haya
sapatha prabhatakalera yakhana ta alokodbhasita haya
niscaya jahannama gurutara bipadasamuhera an'yatama
manusera jan'ye satarkakari.
Tomadera madhye ye samane agrasara haya athaba pascate thake.
Pratyeka byakti tara krtakarmera jan'ya dayi
kintu danadikasthara
tara thakabe jannate ebam paraspare jijnasabada karabe.
Aparadhidera samparke
balabeh tomaderake kise jahanname nita kareche
tara balabeh amara namaya paratama na
abhabagrastake aharyya ditama na
Amara samalocakadera sathe samalocana karatama.
Ebam amara pratiphala dibasake asbikara karatama.
Amadera mrtyu paryanta.
Ata'eba, suparisakaridera suparisa tadera kona upakare asabe na.
Tadera ki hala ye, tara upadesa theke mukha phiriye neya
yena tara itastatah biksipta gardabha.
Hattagolera karane palayanapara.
Baram tadera pratyeke'i caya tadera pratyekake ekati um'mukta grantha deya hoka.
Kakhana'o na, baram tara parakalake bhaya kare na.
Kakhana'o na, eta to upadesa matra.
Ata'eba, yara iccha, se eke smarana karuka.
Tara smarana karabe na, kintu yadi allaha cana. Tini'i bhayera yogya ebam ksamara adhikari.
Ami sapatha kari keyamata dibasera
ara'o sapatha kari se'i manera, ye nijeke dhikkara deya
manusa ki mane kare ye ami tara asthisamuha ekatrita karaba na
paranta ami tara anguligulo paryanta sathikabhabe sannibesita karate saksama.
Baram manusa tara bhabisyata jibane'o dhrstata karate caya
se prasna kare-keyamata dibasa kabe
yakhana drsti camake yabe
candra jyotihina haye yabe.
Ebam surya o candrake ekatrita kara habe
se dina manusa balabeh palayanera jayaga kothaya
na kotha'o asrayasthala ne'i.
Apanara palanakartara kache'i sedina thami habe.
Sedina manusake abahita kara habe se ya samane prerana kareche o pascate chere diyeche.
Baram manusa nije'i tara nijera samparke caksumana.
Yadi'o se tara ajuhata pesa karate ca'ibe.
Taratari sikhe neyara jan'ye apani druta ohi abrtti karabena na.
Era sanraksana o patha amara'i dayitba.
Atahpara ami yakhana ta patha kari, takhana apani se'i pathera anusarana karuna.
Erapara bisada barnana amara'i dayitba.
Kakhana'o na, baram tomara parthiba jibanake bhalabasa
ebam parakalake upeksa kara.
Sedina aneka mukhamandala ujjbala habe.
Tara tara palanakartara dike takiye thakabe.
Ara aneka mukhamandala sedina udasa haye parabe.
Tara dharana karabe ye, tadera sathe komara-bhanga acarana kara habe.
Kakhana'o na, yakhana prana kanthagata habe.
Ebam bala habe, ke jharabe
ebam se mane karabe ye, bidayera ksana ese geche.
Ebam gocha gochara sathe jarita haye yabe.
Sedina, apanara palanakartara nikata sabakichu nita habe.
Se bisbasa kareni ebam namaya pareni
paranta mithyaropa kareche o prstha pradarsana kareche.
Atahpara se dambhabhare paribara-parijanera nikata phire giyeche.
Tomara durbhogera upara durbhoga.
Atahpara, tomara durbhogera upara durbhoga.
Manusa ki mane kare ye, take emani chere deya habe
se ki skhalita birya chila na
atahpara se chila raktapinda, atahpara allaha take srsti karechena ebam subin'yasta karechena.
Atahpara ta theke srsti karechena yugala nara o nari.
Tabu'o ki se'i allaha mrtaderake jibita karate saksama nana
manusera upara emana kichu samaya atibahita hayeche yakhana se ullekhayogya kichu chila na.
Ami manusake srsti karechi misra sukrabindu theke, ebhabe ye, take pariksa karaba atahpara take kare diyechi srabana o drstisaktisampanna.
Ami take patha dekhiye diyechi. Ekhana se haya krtajna haya, na haya akrtajna haya.
Ami abisbasidera jan'ye prastuta rekhechi sikala, beri o prajbalita agni.
Niscaya'i satkarmasilara pana karabe kaphura misrita panapatra.
Eta ekata jharana, ya theke allahara bandagana pana karabe-tara eke prabahita karabe.
Tara mannata purna kare ebam sedinake bhaya kare, yedinera anista habe suduraprasari.
Tara allahara preme abhabagrasta, etima o bandike aharya dana kare.
Tara baleh kebala allahara santustira jan'ye amara tomaderake aharya dana kari ebam tomadera kache kona pratidana o krtajnata kamana kari na.
Amara amadera palanakartara tarapha theke eka bhitiprada bhayankara dinera bhaya rakhi.
Atahpara allaha taderake sedinera anista theke raksa karabena ebam taderake dibena sajibata o ananda.
Ebam tadera sabarera pratidane taderake dibena jannata o resami posaka.
Tara sekhane sinhasane helana diye basabe. Sekhane raudra o saitya anubhaba karabe na.
Tara brksachaya tadera upara jhumke thakabe ebam tara phalasamuha tadera ayattadhina rakha habe.
Taderake paribesana kara habe rupara patre ebam sphatikera mata panapatre.
Rupali sphatika patre, paribesanakarira ta parimapa kare purna karabe.
Taderake sekhane pana karano habe ‘yanajabila’ misrita panapatra.

ebam akasera prati laksya kare na ye, ta kibhabe ucca kara hayeche
ebam paharera dike ye, ta kibhabe sthapana kara hayeche
ebam prthibira dike ye, ta kibhabe samatala bichano hayeche
ata'eba, apani upadesa dina, apani to kebala ekajana upadesadata
apani tadera sasaka nana
kintu ye mukha phiriye neya o kaphera haye yaya
allaha take maha ayaba debena.
Niscaya tadera pratyabartana amara'i nikata
atahpara tadera hisaba-nikasa amara'i dayitba.
Sapatha phajarera
sapatha dasa ratrira, sapatha tara
ya jora o ya bijora
ebam sapatha ratrira yakhana ta gata hate thake
era madhye ache sapatha jnani byaktira jan'ye.
Apani ki laksya karenani, apanara palanakarta ada bansera irama gotrera sathe ki acarana karechilena
yadera daihika gathana stambha o khumtira n'yaya dirgha chila ebam
yadera samana sakti o balabirye sara bisbera saharasamuhe kona loka srjita hayani
ebam samuda gotrera sathe, yara upatyakaya pathara kete grha nirmana karechila.
Ebam bahu kilakera adhipati phera'unera sathe
yara dese simalanghana karechila.
Atahpara sekhane bistara asanti srsti karechila.
Atahpara apanara palanakarta taderake sastira kasaghata karalena.
Niscaya apanara palakarta satarka drsti rakhena.
Manusa erupa ye, yakhana tara palanakarta take pariksa karena, atahpara sam'mana o anugraha dana karena, takhana bale, amara palanakarta amake sam'mana dana karechena.
Ebam yakhana take pariksa karena, atahpara riyika sankucita kare dena, takhana baleh amara palanakarta amake heya karechena.
Eta amulaka, baram tomara etimake sam'mana kara na.
Ebam misakinake annadane parasparake utsahita kara na.
Ebam tomara mrtera tyajya sampatti sampurnarupe kuksigata kare phela
ebam tomara dhana-sampadake pranabhare bhalabasa.
Eta anucita. Yakhana prthibi curna-bicurna habe
ebam apanara palanakarta o pheresatagana saribad'dhabhabe upasthita habena
ebam sedina jahannamake ana habe, sedina manusa smarana karabe, kintu e'i smarana tara ki kaje asabe
se balabeh haya, e jibanera jan'ye ami yadi kichu agre prerana karatama
sedina tara sastira mata sasti ke'u dibe na.
Ebam tara bandhanera mata bandhana ke'u dibe na.
He prasanta mana
tumi tomara palanakartara nikata phire ya'o santusta o santosabhajana haye.
Atahpara amara bandadera antarbhukta haye ya'o.
Ebam amara jannate prabesa kara.
Ami e'i nagarira sapatha kari
ebam e'i nagarite apanara upara kona pratibandhakata ne'i.
Sapatha janakera o ya janma deya.
Niscaya ami manusake sramanirbhararupe srsti karechi.
Se ki mane kare ye, tara upara ke'u ksamatabana habe na
se baleh ami pracura dhana-sampada byaya karechi.
Se ki mane kare ye, take ke'u dekheni
ami ki take de'ini caksudbaya
jihaba o osthadbaya
bastutah ami take du’ti patha pradarsana karechi.
Atahpara se dharmera ghamtite prabesa kareni.
Apani janena, se ghamti ki
ta hacche dasamukti
athaba durbhiksera dine annadana.
Etima atbiyake
athaba dhuli-dhusarita misakinake
atahpara tadera antarbhukta ha'oya, yara imana ane ebam parasparake upadesa deya sabarera o upadesa deya dayara.
Tara'i saubhagyasali.
Ara yara amara ayatasamuha asbikara kare tara'i hatabhaga.
Tara agniparibestita abasthaya bandi thakabe.
Sapatha suryera o tara kiranera
sapatha candrera yakhana ta suryera pascate ase
sapatha dibasera yakhana se suryake prakharabhabe prakasa kare
sapatha ratrira yakhana se suryake acchadita kare
sapatha akasera ebam yini ta nirmana karechena, tamra.
Sapatha prthibira ebam yini ta bistrta karechena, tamra
sapatha pranera ebam yini ta subin'yasta karechena, tamra
atahpara take tara asatkarma o satkarmera jnana dana karechena
ye nijeke sud'dha kare, se'i saphalakama haya.
Ebam ye nijeke kalusita kare, se byartha manoratha haya.
Samuda sampradaya abadhyata basatah mithyaropa karechila.
Yakhana tadera sarbadhika hatabhagya byakti tatpara haye uthechila.
Atahpara allahara rasula taderake balechilenah allahara ustri o take pani pana karanora byapare satarka thaka.
Atahpara ora tara prati mithyaropa karechila ebam ustrira pa kartana karechila. Tadera papera karane tadera palanakarta tadera upara dhbansa nayila kare ekakara kare dilena.
Allaha ta’ala e'i dhbansera kona birupa parinatira asanka karena na.
Sapatha ratrira, yakhana se acchanna kare
sapatha dinera, yakhana se alokita haya
ebam tamra, yini nara o nari srsti karechena
niscaya tomadera karma pracesta bibhinna dharanera.
Ata'eba, ye dana kare ebam khodabhiru haya
ebam uttama bisayake satya mane kare
ami take sukhera bisayera jan'ye sahaja patha dana karaba.
Ara ye krpanata kare o bepara'oya haya
ebam uttama bisayake mithya mane kare
ami take kastera bisayera jan'ye sahaja patha dana karaba.
Yakhana se adhahpatita habe, takhana tara sampada tara kona'i kaje asabe na.
Amara dayitba patha pradarsana kara.
Ara ami malika ihakalera o parakalera.
Ata'eba, ami tomaderake prajbalita agni samparke satarka kare diyechi.
Ete nitanta hatabhagya byakti'i prabesa karabe
ye mithyaropa kare o mukha phiriye neya.
E theke dure rakha habe khodabhiru byaktike
ye atnasud'dhira jan'ye tara dhana-sampada dana kare.
Ebam tara upara kara'o kona pratidanayogya anugraha thake na.
Tara mahana palanakartara santusti anbesana byatita.
Se satbara'i santusti labha karabe.

apanara palanakarta apanake tyaga kareni ebam apanara prati birupa'o hanani.

Tini ki apanake etimarupe panani? Atahpara tini asraya diyechena.
Tini apanake peyechena pathahara, atahpara pathapradarsana karechena.
Tini apanake peyechena nihsba, atahpara abhabamukta karechena.

ebam sina'i prantarastha tura parbatera
ebam e'i nirapada nagarira.
Ami srsti karechi manusake sundaratara abayabe.
Atahpara take phiriye diyechi nica theke nice.
Kintu yara bisbasa sthapana kareche o satkarma kareche, tadera jan'ye rayeche asesa puraskara.
Atahpara kena tumi abisbasa karacha keyamatake
allaha ki bicarakadera madhye srestatama bicaraka nana
patha karuna apanara palanakartara name yini srsti karechena

Patha karuna, apanara palanakarta maha dayalu
yini kalamera sahayye siksa diyechena
siksa diyechena manusake ya se janata na.
Satyi satyi manusa simalanghana kare
e karane ye, se nijeke abhabamukta mane kare.
Niscaya apanara palanakartara dike'i pratyabartana habe.
Apani ki take dekhechena, ye nisedha kare
eka bandake yakhana se namaya pare
apani ki dekhechena yadi se satpathe thake.
Athaba khodabhiti siksa deya.
Apani ki dekhechena, yadi se mithyaropa kare o mukha phiriye neya.
Se ki jane na ye, allaha dekhena
kakhana'i naya, yadi se birata na haya, tabe ami mastakera samanera kesaguccha dhare hemcaraba'i
mithyacari, papira kesaguccha.
Ata'eba, se tara sabhasadaderake ahabana karuka.
Ami'o ahabana karaba jahannamera prahariderake
kakhana'i naya, apani tara anugatya karabena na. Apani sejada karuna o amara naikatya arjana karuna.
Ami eke nayila karechi sabe-kadare.
Sabe-kadara samandhe apani ki janena
sabe-kadara hala eka hajara masa apeksa srestha.
Ete pratyeka kajera jan'ye pheresatagana o ruha abatirna haya tadera palanakartara nirdesakrame.
Eta nirapatta, ya phajarera udaya paryanta abyahata thake.
Ahale-kitaba o musarekadera madhye yara kaphera chila, tara pratyabartana karata na yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana asata.
Arthat allahara ekajana rasula, yini abrtti karatena pabitra sahipha
yate ache, sathika bisayabastu.
Apara kitaba praptara ye bibhranta hayeche, ta hayeche tadera kache suspasta pramana asara pare'i.
Taderake echara kona nirdesa kara hayani ye, tara khamti mane ekanisthabhabe allahara ebadata karabe, namaya kayema karabe ebam yakata debe. Eta'i sathika dharma.
Ahale-kitaba o musarekadera madhye yara kaphera, tara jahannamera agune sthayibhabe thakabe. Tara'i srstira adhama.
Yara imana ane o satkarma kare, tara'i srstira sera.

Tadera palanakartara kache rayeche tadera pratidana cirakala basabasera jannata, yara taladese nirjharini prabahita. Tara sekhane thakabe anantakala. Allaha tadera prati santusta ebam tara allahara prati santusta. Eta tara jan'ye, ye tara palanakartake bhaya kara.
Yakhana prthibi tara kampane prakampita habe
yakhana se tara bojha bera kare debe.

Atahpara ke'u anu parimana satkarma karale ta dekhate pabe
ebam ke'u anu parimana asatkarma karale ta'o dekhate pabe.
Sapatha urdhbasbase calamana asbasamuhera

Ye artha sancita kare o ganana kare
